GP12brndp1_u:1050: pravibhāgena bhūteṣu satyamātre sthiteṣu vā // BndP_1,7.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:1054: tatastu salile tasmin jñātvā tvantargato mahīm // BndP_1,7.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:1056: cakāra taṃ tu devo 'tha pūrvakalpādiṣu smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,7.6 //
GP12brndp1_u:1058: adbhiḥ saṃchāditāmicchan pṛthivīṃ sa prajāpatiḥ // BndP_1,7.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:1060: sāmudrāśca samudreṣu nādeyāśca nadīṣu ca // BndP_1,7.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:1062: prāksarge dahyamāne tu purā saṃvarta kāgninā // BndP_1,7.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:1064: śailyādekārṇave tasminvāyunā ye tu saṃhitāḥ // BndP_1,7.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:1069: saptasapta tu varṣāṇi tasyā dvīpeṣu saptasu /
GP12brndp1_u:1078: kalpasya cāsya brahmā cāsṛjadyaḥ sthāninaḥ surān // BndP_1,7.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:1080: svargaṃ diśaḥ samudrāṃśca nadīḥ sarvāṃstu parvatān // BndP_1,7.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:1086: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca tiṣyaṃ caiva tathā yugam // BndP_1,7.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:1088: prāguktāśca mayā tubhyaṃ pūrvve kalpe prajāstu tāḥ // BndP_1,7.22 //
GP12brndp1_u:1091: āvartante punaḥ sarge vīkṣārthaṃ tā bhavanti hi /
GP12brndp1_u:1092: vīkṣyārthaṃ tāḥ sthitāstatra punaḥ sargasya kāraṇāt // BndP_1,7.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:1094: dharmmārtha kāmamokṣāṇāmiha tāḥ sādhitāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,7.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:1097: brāhmaṇo manavaste vai siddhātmāno bhavanti hi /
GP12brndp1_u:1098: āsaṃgadveṣayuktena karmaṇā te divaṃ gatāḥ // BndP_1,7.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:1102: apsu yaḥ kāraṇaṃ teṣāṃ bodhayankarmmaṇā tu saḥ // BndP_1,7.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:1104: gṛhṇanti te śarīrāṇi nānārūpāṇi yoniṣu // BndP_1,7.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:1106: teṣāṃ medhyāni karmmāṇi prāyaśaḥ pratipedire // BndP_1,7.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:1108: punaḥ punaste kalpeṣu jāyante nāmarūpeṇaḥ // BndP_1,7.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:1120: tataḥ prabhṛti kalpe 'sminmaithunānāṃ ca saṃbhavaḥ // BndP_1,7.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:1121: dhyānena manasā tāsāṃ prajānāṃ jāyate kṛte /
GP12brndp1_u:1124: tathānvayāstu saṃbhūtā yairidaṃ pūritaṃ jagat // BndP_1,7.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:1126: tadā tā hyalpasaṃtoṣāyuddhe tasmiṃścaraṃti vai // BndP_1,7.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:1127: pṛthvī rasavatī nāma āhāraṃ vyāharaṃti ca /
GP12brndp1_u:1128: tāḥ prajāḥ kāmacāriṇyo mānasīṃ siddhimicchataḥ // BndP_1,7.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:1130: dharmādharmauṃ tadā na staḥ kalpādau prathame yuge // BndP_1,7.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:1132: catvāri tu sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ divyasaṃkhyayā // BndP_1,7.44 //
GP12brndp1_u:1133: ādau kṛtayugaṃ prāhuḥ saṃdhyāṃśau ca catuḥśatau /
GP12brndp1_u:1135: na tāsāṃ pratighāto 'sti na dvaṃdvaṃ nāpi ca kramaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1140: nodvijā notkaṭāścaiva dharmasya prakriyā tu sā // BndP_1,7.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:1144: uttiṣṭhaṃti pṛthivyāṃ vai teṣāṃ dhyānai rasātalāt // BndP_1,7.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:1148: samaṃ janma ca rūpaṃ ca prīyaṃte caiva tāḥ samāḥ // BndP_1,7.52 //
GP12brndp1_u:1149: tadā satyamalobhaśca saṃtuṣṭiśca ca sukhaṃ damaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1156: sukhaprāyā viśokāśca utpadyaṃte kṛte yuge // BndP_1,7.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:1157: lābhālābhau na vā syātāṃ mitrāmitrau priyāpriyau /
GP12brndp1_u:1159: nāti hiṃsati vānyonyaṃ nānugṛṅṇaṃti vai tadā // BndP_1,7.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:1160: jñānaṃ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ yajña ucyate /
GP12brndp1_u:1161: pavṛttaṃ dvāpare yuddhaṃ steyameva kalau yuge // BndP_1,7.59 //
GP12brndp1_u:1162: sattvaṃ kṛtaṃ rajastretā dvāparaṃ tu rajastamaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1163: kalistamastu vijñeyaṃ guṇavṛttaṃ gumeṣu tat // BndP_1,7.60 //
GP12brndp1_u:1164: kālaḥ kṛtayuge tveṣa tasya sandhyāṃ nibodhata /
GP12brndp1_u:1165: catvāri tu sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tatkṛtaṃ yugam // BndP_1,7.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:1166: sādhyāṃśau tasya divyāni śatānyaṣṭau tu saṃkhyayā /
GP12brndp1_u:1167: catvāryaiva sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ monuṣāṇi tu // BndP_1,7.62 //
GP12brndp1_u:1169: tataḥ kṛtyuge tasmin sasaṃdhyāṃśe gate tadā // BndP_1,7.63 //
GP12brndp1_u:1171: sandhyāyāstu vyatītāyāḥ sāṃdhyaḥ kālo yugasya saḥ // BndP_1,7.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:1174: tasyāṃ ca sandhau naṣṭāyāṃ mānasī cābhavatprajā /
GP12brndp1_u:1176: sargādau yā mayāṣṭau tu mānasyo vai prakīrtitāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1177: aṣṭau tāḥ kramayogena siddhayo yāṃti saṃkṣayam // BndP_1,7.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:1178: kalpādau mānasī hyekā siddhirbhavati sā kṛte /
GP12brndp1_u:1181: saṃdhyā kṛtasya pādena saṃkṣepeṇa vaśāttataḥ // BndP_1,7.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:1186: tasmin kṣīṇe kṛtāṃśe vai tāsu śiṣṭāsu saptasu /
GP12brndp1_u:1190: apāṃśau tau pratigatau tadā meghātmānā tu vai /
GP12brndp1_u:1193: prajā āsaṃstatastāsāṃ vṛkṣaśca gṛha saṃjñitāḥ // BndP_1,7.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:1199: tadā tadvai na bhavati punaryugabalena tu // BndP_1,7.78 //
GP12brndp1_u:1201: tatastenaiva yogena varttate maithunaṃ tadā // BndP_1,7.79 //
GP12brndp1_u:1204: viparyayeṇa teṣāṃ tu tena tatkāla bhāvitā /
GP12brndp1_u:1205: praṇaśyaṃti tataḥ sarve vṛkṣāste gṛhasaṃjñitāḥ // BndP_1,7.81 //
GP12brndp1_u:1209: vastrāṇi ca prasūyaṃte phalānyābharaṇāni ca // BndP_1,7.83 //
GP12brndp1_u:1211: ānvīkṣikaṃ mahāvīryaṃ puṭake puṭake madhu // BndP_1,7.84 //
GP12brndp1_u:1212: tena tā varttayanti smamukhe tretāyugasya vai /
GP12brndp1_u:1215: vṛkṣāṃstāḥ paryagṛhṇaṃta madhu vā mākṣikaṃ balāt // BndP_1,7.86 //
GP12brndp1_u:1217: pranaṣṭā prabhuṇā sārddhaṃ kalpavṛkṣāḥ kvacitkvacit // BndP_1,7.87 //
GP12brndp1_u:1219: varttaṃte cānayā tāsāṃ dvaṃdvānyatyutthitāni tu // BndP_1,7.88 //
GP12brndp1_u:1225: madhudhunvatsu niṣṭheṣu parvateṣu nadīṣu ca // BndP_1,7.91 //
GP12brndp1_u:1227: yathājoṣaṃ yathākāmaṃ sameṣu viṣameṣu ca // BndP_1,7.92 //
GP12brndp1_u:1229: tatastānnirmayāmāsuḥ kheṭāni ca purāṇi ca // BndP_1,7.93 //
GP12brndp1_u:1233: mānārthāni pramāṇāni tadā prabhṛti cakrire // BndP_1,7.95 //
GP12brndp1_u:1235: daśa tvaṃgulaparvāṇi prādeśa iti saṃjñitaḥ // BndP_1,7.96 //
GP12brndp1_u:1243: dhanuḥsahastre dve tatra gavyūtistauḥ kṛtā tadā // BndP_1,7.100 //
GP12brndp1_u:1247: caturtha kṛtimaṃ duga tasya vakṣyāmi nirṇayam // BndP_1,7.102 //
GP12brndp1_u:1251: hastasroto daśaśreṣṭho navahastoṣṭa eva ca // BndP_1,7.104 //
GP12brndp1_u:1252: kheṭānāṃ ca purāṇāṃ ca grāmāṇāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1258: vṛttaṃ vajraṃ ca dīrgha ca nagaraṃ na praśasyate /
GP12brndp1_u:1259: caturasrayutaṃ divyaṃ praśastaṃ taiḥ puraṃ kṛtam // BndP_1,7.108 //
GP12brndp1_u:1261: atra madhyaṃ praśaṃsaṃti hrasvaṃ kāṣṭhavivarjjitam // BndP_1,7.109 //
GP12brndp1_u:1265: dvikrośaḥ paramā sīmā kṣetrasīmā caturddhanuḥ // BndP_1,7.111 //
GP12brndp1_u:1266: viṃśaddhanūṃṣi vistīrṇo diśāṃ mārgastu taiḥ kṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1268: dhanūṃṣi daśa vistīrṇaḥ śrīmān rājapathaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1275: kṛteṣu teṣu sthāneṣu punargehagṛhāṇi vai // BndP_1,7.116 //
GP12brndp1_u:1276: yathā te pūrvamāsaṃśca vṛkṣāstu gṛha saṃsthitāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1277: tathā kartuṃ samārabdhāściṃtayitvā punaḥ punaḥ // BndP_1,7.117 //
GP12brndp1_u:1279: ata ūrddha gatāścānyā evaṃ tiryaggatāḥ parā // BndP_1,7.118 //
GP12brndp1_u:1281: yathā kṛtāstu taiḥ śākhāsta smācchālāstu tāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,7.119 //
GP12brndp1_u:1282: evaṃ prasiddhāḥ śākhābhyaḥ śāloścaiva gṛhāṇi ca /
GP12brndp1_u:1283: tasmāttāśca smṛtāḥ śālāḥ śālātvaṃ tāsu tatsmṛtam // BndP_1,7.120 //
GP12brndp1_u:1285: tasmād gṛhāṇi śālāśca prāsādāścaiva saṃjñitā // BndP_1,7.121 //
GP12brndp1_u:1287: naṣṭeṣu madhunā sārddhaṃ kalpavṛkṣeṣu vai tadā // BndP_1,7.122 //
GP12brndp1_u:1289: tataḥ prādurbabhau tāsāṃ siddhistretāyuge tadā // BndP_1,7.123 //
GP12brndp1_u:1291: tāsāṃ vṛṣṭyudakānīha yāni miṣṭagatāni ca // BndP_1,7.124 //
GP12brndp1_u:1293: ye parastādapāṃ stokāḥ saṃpātāḥ puthivītale // BndP_1,7.125 //
GP12brndp1_u:1299: tadauṣadhena vartaṃte prajāstretā mukhe tadā // BndP_1,7.128 //
GP12brndp1_u:1304: siddhātmānastu ye pūrvaṃ vyākhyātā vaḥ kṛte mayā /
GP12brndp1_u:1305: brahmaṇo mānasāste vai utpannā ye janādiha // BndP_1,7.131 //
GP12brndp1_u:1307: tata āvarttamānāste tretāyāṃ jajñire punaḥ // BndP_1,7.132 //
GP12brndp1_u:1309: bhāvitāḥ pūrvajātīṣu khyātyā te śubhapāpayoḥ // BndP_1,7.133 //
GP12brndp1_u:1310: tataste prabalā ye tu satyaśīlā ahiṃsakāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1311: vītalobhā jitātmāno nivasaṃti smṛteṣu vai // BndP_1,7.134 //
GP12brndp1_u:1313: teṣāṃ karmāṇi kurvaṃti tebhyaścaivābalāśca ye // BndP_1,7.135 //
GP12brndp1_u:1316: tena doṣeṇa vai śāṃtā oṣadhyo nitarāṃ tadā /
GP12brndp1_u:1317: pranaṣṭā gṛhyamāṇā vai muṣṭibhyāṃ sikatā yathā // BndP_1,7.137 //
GP12brndp1_u:1319: phalairgṛhṇaṃti puṣpaiśca tathā mūlaiśca tāḥ punaḥ // BndP_1,7.138 //
GP12brndp1_u:1321: kṣudhāviṣṭāstadā sarvā jagmustā vai svayambhuvam // BndP_1,7.139 //
GP12brndp1_u:1323: brahmā svayaṃbhūrbhagavān jñātvā tāsāṃ manīṣitam // BndP_1,7.140 //
GP12brndp1_u:1325: grastāḥ pṛthivyā tvoṣadhyo jñātvā pratyarūhatpunaḥ // BndP_1,7.141 //
GP12brndp1_u:1326: kṛtvā vatsaṃ sameruṃ tu dudoha pṛthivīmimām /
GP12brndp1_u:1327: dugdheyaṃ gaustadā tena bījāni vasudhātale // BndP_1,7.142 //
GP12brndp1_u:1328: jajñire tāni bījāni grāmāraṇyāstu tāḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1334: ityetā oṣadhīnāṃ tu grāmyāṇāṃ jātayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1337: grāmāraṇyāḥ smṛtā hyetā oṣadhyastu caturdaśa // BndP_1,7.147 //
GP12brndp1_u:1342: pṛthvī dugdhā tu bījāni yāni pūrvaṃ svayaṃbhuvā /
GP12brndp1_u:1343: ṛtupuṣpaphalāstā vai oṣadhyo jajñire tviha // BndP_1,7.150 //
GP12brndp1_u:1344: yadā prasṛṣṭā oṣadhyo na prathaṃtīha yāḥ punaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1345: tatastāsāṃ ca pṛttyarthai vārtopāyaṃ cakāra ha // BndP_1,7.151 //
GP12brndp1_u:1347: tataḥ prabhṛti cauṣadhyaḥ kṛṣṭapacyāstu jajñire // BndP_1,7.152 //
GP12brndp1_u:1353: satyaṃ būta yathābhūtaṃ dhruvaṃ vo brahmaṇāstu tāḥ // BndP_1,7.155 //
GP12brndp1_u:1355: krītāni nāśayaṃti sma pṛthivyāṃ te vyavasthitāḥ // BndP_1,7.156 //
GP12brndp1_u:1357: sevaṃtaśca dravaṃtaśca paricaryāsu ye ratāḥ // BndP_1,7.157 //
GP12brndp1_u:1359: teṣāṃ karmāṇi dharmāṃśca brahmā tu vyadadhātprabhuḥ // BndP_1,7.158 //
GP12brndp1_u:1360: saṃsthityāṃ tu kṛtāyāṃ hi yāturvarṇyasya tena vai /
GP12brndp1_u:1361: punaḥ prajāstu tā mohāddharmmaṃ taṃ nānvapālayan // BndP_1,7.159 //
GP12brndp1_u:1363: brahmā buddhā tu tatsarvaṃ yāthātathyena sa prabhuḥ // BndP_1,7.160 //
GP12brndp1_u:1367: pāśupālyaṃ ca vāṇijyaṃ kṛṣiṃ caiva viśāṃ dadau // BndP_1,7.162 //
GP12brndp1_u:1369: sāmānyāni ca karmāṇi brahmakṣatraviśāṃ punaḥ // BndP_1,7.163 //
GP12brndp1_u:1371: karmājīvaṃ tu vai dattvā teṣāmiha parasparam // BndP_1,7.164 //
GP12brndp1_u:1372: teṣāṃ lokāṃtare mūrdhni sthānāni vidadhe punaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1373: prājāpatyaṃ dvijātīnāṃ smṛtaṃ sthānaṃ kriyāvatām // BndP_1,7.165 //
GP12brndp1_u:1378: saṃsthityāṃ sukṛtāyāṃ vai cāturvarṇyasya tasya tat /
GP12brndp1_u:1380: tataḥ sthiteṣu varṇeṣu sthāpayāmāsa hyāśramān // BndP_1,7.168 //
GP12brndp1_u:1386: nirddideśa tatasteṣāṃ brahmā dharmānprabhā ṣate // BndP_1,7.171 //
GP12brndp1_u:1389: trayāṇā māśramāṇāṃ ca vṛttiyonīti caiva hi /
GP12brndp1_u:1390: yathākramaṃ ca vakṣyāmi vrataiśca niyamaistathā // BndP_1,7.173 //
GP12brndp1_u:1393: ḍhaṃḍī ca mekhalī caiva adhaḥśāyī tathājinī /
GP12brndp1_u:1398: apramādo 'vyavāyaśca dayā bhūteṣu ca kṣamā // BndP_1,7.177 //
GP12brndp1_u:1399: śravaṇaṃ guruśuśrūṣā satyaṃ ca daśamaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:1400: daśalakṣaṇako hyeṣa dharmaḥ proktaḥ svayaṃbhūvā // BndP_1,7.178 //
GP12brndp1_u:1402: teṣāṃ sthānānyaśuṣmiṃ ca saṃsthitānā macaṣṭa saḥ // BndP_1,7.179 //
GP12brndp1_u:1404: smṛtaṃ teṣāṃ tu yat sthānaṃ tadeva guruvāsinām // BndP_1,7.180 //
GP12brndp1_u:1405: saptarṣīṇā tu yatsthānaṃ smṛtaṃ tadvai vanaukasām /
GP12brndp1_u:1410: paṃthānaḥ pitṛyānāstu samṛtāścatvāra eva te // BndP_1,7.183 //
GP12brndp1_u:1412: paṃthāno devayānā ye teṣāṃ dvāraṃ raṃviḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1414: evaṃ varṇāśramāṇāṃ ca pravibhāge kṛte tadā /
GP12brndp1_u:1415: yadā prajā nā varddhaṃta varṇadharmasamāsikāḥ // BndP_1,7.185 //
GP12brndp1_u:1418: tasmistretāyuge tvādye madhyaṃ prāpte krameṇa tu /
GP12brndp1_u:1419: tato 'nyāṃ mānasīṃ so 'tha prajāḥ sraṣṭuṃ pracakrame // BndP_1,7.187 //
GP12brndp1_u:1423: yugānurūpā dharmeṇa yairimā varddhitāḥ prajāḥ // BndP_1,7.189 //
GP12brndp1_u:1425: abhidhyāya prajā brahmā nānāvīryāḥ svamānasīḥ // BndP_1,7.190 //
GP12brndp1_u:1426: pūrvoktā yā mayā tubhyaṃ janānīkaṃ samāśritāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1436: āhārārthaṃ prajānāṃ vai vidātmāno vinirmame // BndP_1,7.195 //
GP12brndp1_u:1437: iti śrībrahmāṃḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṃgapāde lokajñāna varṇanaṃ nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:1446: tato 'sya jagha nātpūrvamasurā jajñira sutāḥ // BndP_1,8.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:1448: sṛṣṭā yayā surāstanvā tāṃ tanuṃ sa vyapohata // BndP_1,8.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:1454: tatastāṃ yuñja mānasya priyamāsītprabhoḥ kila // BndP_1,8.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:1456: yato 'sya dīvyato jātāstena devāḥ prakīrttitāḥ // BndP_1,8.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:1457: dhāturdivyeti yaḥ proktaḥ krīḍāyāṃ sa vibhāvyate /

GP12brndp1_u:1555: teṣāṃ ye yāni karmāṇi prāk sṛṣṭāni prapedire /

GP12brndp1_u:1565: etadevaṃ ca naivaṃ ca na cobhe nānubhe na ca /
GP12brndp1_u:1567: nānārūpaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ kṛtānāṃ ca prapañcanam /
GP12brndp1_u:1568: vedaśabdebhya evādau nirmame sa maheśvaraḥ // BndP_1,8.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:1569: ārṣāṇi caiva nāmāni yāśca deveṣu dṛṣṭayaḥ /

GP12brndp1_u:1573: rudraṃ dharmaṃ manaścaiva ruciṃ caivākṛtiṃ tathā /

GP12brndp1_u:1580: gāyatrīṃ caiva triṣṭup ca jagatī caiva tāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,9.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:1585: dhatte dharmaḥ prajāḥ sarvā mano jñānakaraṃ smṛtam /

GP12brndp1_u:1588: athāsya sṛjataḥ sargaṃ prajānāṃ parivṛddhaye // BndP_1,9.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:1589: na vyavarddhata tāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ prajāḥ kenāpi hetunā /

GP12brndp1_u:1592: rajaḥ sattvaṃ parityajya vartamānāṃ svakarmataḥ // BndP_1,9.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:1593: tataḥ sa tena dukhenaśucaṃ cakre jagatpatiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1596: adharmācaraṇā ttasya hiṃsā śoko vyajāyata // BndP_1,9.12 //

GP12brndp1_u:1601: sā hi kāmātmanā sṛṣṭā prakṛteḥ sā surūpiṇī /

GP12brndp1_u:1605: yadā prajāstu tāḥ sṛṣṭā na vyavaddhata dhīmataḥ /

GP12brndp1_u:2186: dvipadāṃ catuṣpadāṃ caiva pakṣiṇāṃ sarvatāmapi // BndP_1,13.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:2187: sthāvarāṇāṃ ca pañcānāṃ puṣpaṃ kālārttavaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:2188: ṛtutvamārtavatvaṃ ca pitṛtvaṃ ca prakīrttitam // BndP_1,13.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:2191: tasmādete hi pitara ārtavā iti naḥ śrutam /
GP12brndp1_u:2196: jajñe svadhāpitṛbhyastu dve kanye lokaviśrute // BndP_1,13.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:2197: menā ca dhāraṇī caiva yābhyāṃ dhatamidaṃ jagat /
GP12brndp1_u:2198: te ubhe brahmavādinyau yoginyau caiva te ubhe // BndP_1,13.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:2199: pitaraste nije kanye dharmārthaṃ pradaduḥ śubhe /
GP12brndp1_u:2200: agniṣvāttāstu ye proktāsteṣāṃ menā tu mānasī // BndP_1,13.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:2201: dhāraṇī mānasī caiva kanyā barhiṣadāṃ smṛtā /
GP12brndp1_u:2202: merostāṃ dhāraṇīṃ nāma patnyarthaṃ vā sṛjan ghubhām // BndP_1,13.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:2204: agniṣvāttāstu tāṃ menā patnī himavate daduḥ // BndP_1,13.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:2206: menā himavataḥ patnī mainākaṃ sā vyajāyata // BndP_1,13.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:2207: gaṅgāṃ saridvarāṃ caiva patnī yā lavaṇodadheḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2208: mainākasyā tmajaḥ kraucaḥ kraiñcadvīpo yataḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,13.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:2210: mandaraṃ suṣuve putraṃ tisraḥ kanyāśca viśrutāḥ // BndP_1,13.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:2211: velāṃ ca niyatiṃ caiva tṛtīyāṃ cāyatiṃ viduḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2213: svāyaṃ bhuveṃ'tare pūrvaṃ yayorvai kīrttitāḥ prajāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2216: savarṇāyāṃ sutā jātā daśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ // BndP_1,13.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:2218: teṣāṃ svāyaṃbhuvo dakṣaḥ putratvaṃ jagmi vānprabhuḥ // BndP_1,13.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:2221: utpannaḥ sa kathaṃ dakṣo hyabhiśāpādbhavasya tu /
GP12brndp1_u:2222: cākṣuṣasyāntare pūrvaṃ tannaḥ prabrūhi pṛcchatām // BndP_1,13.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:2226: dakṣasyāsansutā hyaṣṭau kanyā yāḥ kīrttitā mayā /
GP12brndp1_u:2227: svebhyo gṛhebhya ānāyya tāḥ pitābhyarcayadgṛhe // BndP_1,13.44 //
GP12brndp1_u:2229: tāsāṃ jyeṣṭhā satī nāma patnī yā tryaṃbakasya vai // BndP_1,13.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:2233: tato jñātvā satī sarvāḥ nyavasaṃstāḥ piturgṛhe // BndP_1,13.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:2235: tābhyo hīnāṃ pitā cakre satyāḥ pūjāmasaṃmatām // BndP_1,13.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:2237: yavīyasībhyo pyadhamāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā mama prabho // BndP_1,13.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:2239: ahaṃ jyeṣṭhā variṣṭhā ca tvaṃ māṃ satkartumarha si // BndP_1,13.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:2241: tvattaḥ śreṣṭhāvariṣṭhāśca pūjyā bālāḥ sutā mama // BndP_1,13.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:2242: tāsāṃ caiva tu bhartāra ste me bahumātāḥ sati /
GP12brndp1_u:2245: vasiṣṭho 'triḥ pulastyaśca hyaṅgirā pulahaḥ kratuḥ // BndP_1,13.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:2247: yasmānmāṃ sparddhate śarvaḥ sadā caivāvamanyate // BndP_1,13.54 //
GP12brndp1_u:2248: tena tvāṃ na vibhūṣomi pratikūlo hi me bhavaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2251: tathoktā pitaraṃ sā vai kruddhā devīdama bravīt // BndP_1,13.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:2265: dakṣasya ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca cukopa bhagavānprabhuḥ // BndP_1,13.62 //
GP12brndp1_u:2269: asyāṃ kṣitau dhṛtā lokāḥ sarve tiṣṭhanti bhāsvarāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2270: tānahaṃ dhārayā mīha satataṃ ca tadājñayā // BndP_1,13.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:2271: cāturvarṇyaṃ hi devānāṃ te cāpyekatra bhuñjate /
GP12brndp1_u:2272: nāhaṃ taiḥ saha bhokṣaye vai tato dāsyanti te pṛthak // BndP_1,13.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:2274: praśastāścetarāḥ sarvāḥ svasutā bhartṛbhiḥ saha // BndP_1,13.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:2276: utpatsyante dvitīye vai mama yajña hyayonicāḥ // BndP_1,13.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:2277: hute vai brahmaṇā śukre cākṣuṣasyātare manoḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2280: prācīnabarhiṣaḥ pautraḥ putraścaiva prace tasām // BndP_1,13.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:2281: dakṣa eveha nāmnā tu māriṣāyāṃ janiṣyasi /
GP12brndp1_u:2282: kanyāyāṃ śākhināṃ tvaṃ vai prāpte vaivasvateṃ'tare // BndP_1,13.70 //
GP12brndp1_u:2284: dharmmayukte ca te kārye ekasmiṃstu durāsade // BndP_1,13.71 //
GP12brndp1_u:2288: tasmātsārddhaṃ surairyajñe na tvāṃ yakṣyanti vai dvijāḥ // BndP_1,13.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:2289: hutvā'hutiṃ tava krūra hyapaḥ sprakṣyanti karmasu /
GP12brndp1_u:2290: ihaiva vatsyasi tathā divaṃ hitvā yugakṣayāt // BndP_1,13.73 //
GP12brndp1_u:2291: tato devaiḥsa taiḥ sārddhaṃ nejyate pṛthasijyate /
GP12brndp1_u:2293: svāyaṃbhuvīṃ tanuṃ tyaktvā utpanno mānuṣeṣviha // BndP_1,13.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:2296: atha devī satī yā tu prāpte vaivasvateṃ'tare /
GP12brndp1_u:2297: menāyāṃ tāmumāṃ devīṃ janayāmāsa śailarāṭ // BndP_1,13.77 //
GP12brndp1_u:2299: sadā patnī bhavasyaiṣā na tayā mucyate bhavaḥ // BndP_1,13.78 //
GP12brndp1_u:2301: yathā nārāyaṇaṃ śrīśca maghavataṃ śacī yathā // BndP_1,13.79 //
GP12brndp1_u:2302: viṣṇuṃ kīrtī ruṣā mūryaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ cāpyarundhatī /
GP12brndp1_u:2303: naitāstu vijahatyetān bhartṝn devyaḥ kadācana // BndP_1,13.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:2304: āvartamānāḥ kalpeṣu jāyante taiḥ punaḥ saha /
GP12brndp1_u:2305: evaṃ prācetaso dakṣo jajñe vai cākṣuṣeṃ'tare // BndP_1,13.81 //
GP12brndp1_u:2307: jajñe tadābhiśāpena dvitīya iti naḥ śrutam // BndP_1,13.82 //
GP12brndp1_u:2308: bhṛgavādayaśca ye sapta jajñire ca maharṣayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2309: ādye tretāyuge pūrvaṃ manorvaivasvatasya ca // BndP_1,13.83 //
GP12brndp1_u:2315: khyātiṃ na muñcate jantustanna kāryaṃ vipaścitā // BndP_1,13.86 //
GP12brndp1_u:2317: yā dakṣamadhikṛtyeha tvayā pūrvaṃ pracauditā // BndP_1,13.87 //
GP12brndp1_u:2321: devāyāmā iti khyātāḥ pūrvaṃ ye yajñasūnavaḥ // BndP_1,13.89 //
GP12brndp1_u:2323: putrāḥ svāyaṃbhuvasyaite śaktā nāma tu mānasāḥ // BndP_1,13.90 //
GP12brndp1_u:2324: teṣāṃ yato gaṇā hyete devānāṃ tu trayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2331: turīya idrayukcaiva yukto grāvajitastu vai // BndP_1,13.94 //
GP12brndp1_u:2333: jaro vibhurvibhāvaśca sa ṛcīko 'tha durdihaḥ // BndP_1,13.95 //
GP12brndp1_u:2345: atīto vartamānena dṛṣṭo vaivasvate na saḥ // BndP_1,13.101 //
GP12brndp1_u:2348: bhṛgvaṃ girā marīciśca pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2351: jyotiṣmān dyutimānhavyaḥ savanaḥ sattra eva ca // BndP_1,13.104 //
GP12brndp1_u:2357: bahutvānnāmadheyānāṃ saṃkhyā teṣāṃ kutaḥ kule // BndP_1,13.107 //
GP12brndp1_u:2362: kasya yoniḥ kimādiśca kiṃ satattvaḥ kimātmakaḥ // BndP_1,13.109 //
GP12brndp1_u:2363: kimasya cakṣuḥ kā mūrtiḥ ke vā avayavāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2364: kiṃ nāmadheyaṃ ko 'syātmā eptattvaṃ brūhi tattvataḥ // BndP_1,13.110 //
GP12brndp1_u:2369: saṃvatsaraḥ satattvaśca nāma cāsya kalātmakaḥ // BndP_1,13.112 //
GP12brndp1_u:2371: pañcadhā pravibhaktāṃ tu kālāvasthāṃ nibodhata // BndP_1,13.113 //
GP12brndp1_u:2377: kraturagnistu yaḥ proktaḥ sa tu saṃvatsaro mataḥ // BndP_1,13.116 //
GP12brndp1_u:2380: sa iḍāvatsaraḥ somaḥ purāṇe niścayaṃ gataḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2384: sa rudro vatsara steṣāṃ vijñeyo nīlalohitaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2385: satattvaṃ tasya vakṣyami kīrtyamānaṃ nibodhata // BndP_1,13.120 //
GP12brndp1_u:2392: yoniḥ sa pravibhāgānāṃ divasānāṃ ca bhāskaraḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2426: devatvaṃ ca pitṛtvaṃ ca kālatvaṃ cāsya yatparam /
GP12brndp1_u:2428: yataḥ patiḥ sa bhagavān prajeśānāṃ prajāpatiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2434: gāyatrī caiva triṣṭupca jagatī caiva yāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2435: tryaṃbakā nāmataḥ premṇā yonayastā vanaspateḥ // BndP_1,13.145 //
GP12brndp1_u:2437: trisādhanaḥ puroḍāśastrikapālaḥ sa vai smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,13.146 //
GP12brndp1_u:2439: ityetatpañcavarṣaṃ hi yugaṃ proktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ // BndP_1,13.147 //
GP12brndp1_u:2440: yaścaiṣa pañcadhātmā vai proktaḥ saṃvatsaro dvijaiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2443: ityeṣa bahumāno vai prāṇinā jīvitāni ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2444: nadīvega ivāsaktaḥ kālo dhāvati saṃharan // BndP_1,13.149 //
GP12brndp1_u:2449: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde kālasadbhāvavarṇanaṃ nāma trayodaśoṃ'dhyāya
GP12brndp1_u:2456: vistareṇānupūrvyā ca kīrtya mānaṃ nibodhata // BndP_1,14.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:2458: yairiyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā saptadvīpā sapattanā // BndP_1,14.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:2464: kanyā sā tu mahābhāga kardamasya prajā pateḥ // BndP_1,14.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:2465: kanye dve daśa putrāśca samrāṭ kukṣiśca te śubhe /
GP12brndp1_u:2466: tayorvai bhrātaraḥ śūrāḥ prajāpatisamā daśa // BndP_1,14.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:2468: jyotiṣmān dyutimānhavyaḥ savanaḥ sabhra eva ca // BndP_1,14.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:2470: dvīpeṣu teṣu dharmeṇa dvīpāntāśca nibodhata // BndP_1,14.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:2476: śākadvīpeśvaraṃ cāpi havyaṃ cakre priyavrataḥ // BndP_1,14.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:2480: mahāvītaṃ smṛtaṃ varṣaṃ tasya nāmnā mahātmanaḥ // BndP_1,14.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:2483: jaladaṃ ca kumāraṃ ca sukumāraṃ maṇīvakam /
GP12brndp1_u:2486: kumārasya tu kaumāraṃ dvitīyaṃ parikīrtitam // BndP_1,14.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:2490: modakasyāpi modākaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ varṣaṃ prakīrttitam // BndP_1,14.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:2492: teṣāṃ tu nāmabhistāni sapta varṣāṇi tatra vai // BndP_1,14.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:2497: kuśalasya tu deśo 'bhūta kauśalo nāma viśrutaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2498: deśo manonugasyāpi mānonuge ite smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,14.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:2502: ete janapadāḥ sapta kraiñcadvīpe tu bhāsvarāḥ // BndP_1,14.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:2504: udbhijjo veṇumāṃścaiva vairatho lavaṇo dhṛtiḥ // BndP_1,14.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:2505: ṣaṣṭhaḥ prabhākaraścā pi saptamaḥ kapilaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2506: udbhijjaṃ prathamaṃ varṣaṃ dvitīyaṃ veṇumaṇḍalam // BndP_1,14.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:2507: tṛtīyaṃ vai rathākāraṃ caturthaṃ lavaṇaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:2508: pañcamaṃ dhṛtimadvarṣaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ varṣaṃ prabhākaram // BndP_1,14.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:2510: teṣāṃ deśāḥ kaśadvīpe tatsanāmāna eva ca // BndP_1,14.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:2512: śālmalasyeśvarāḥ sapta sutāste ca vapuṣmataḥ // BndP_1,14.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:2520: sapta medhātithe putrāḥ plakṣadvīpeśvarā nṛpāḥ // BndP_1,14.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:2521: jyeṣṭhaḥ śāntabhayo nāma dvitīyaḥ śiśiraḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2524: dhruvastu saptamo jñeyaḥ putrā medhātitheḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,14.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:2525: saptānāṃ nāmabhisteṣāṃ tāni varṣāṇi sapta vai /
GP12brndp1_u:2526: tasmācchāntabhayaṃ caiva śiśiraṃ ca sukhodayam // BndP_1,14.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:2527: ānandaṃ ca śivaṃ caiva kṣemakaṃ ca dhruvaṃ tathā /
GP12brndp1_u:2528: tāni teṣāṃ samānāni sapta varṣāṇi bhāgaśaḥ // BndP_1,14.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:2534: sukhamāyuśca rūpaṃ ca balaṃ dharmaśca nityaśaḥ // BndP_1,14.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:2542: ramyastu pañcamaḥ putro hiraṇvān ṣaṣṭha ucyate // BndP_1,14.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:2545: nābhestu dakṣiṇaṃ varṣaṃ himākhyaṃ tu pitā dadau /
GP12brndp1_u:2546: hemakūṭaṃ tu yadvarṣaṃ dadau kipuruṣāya tat // BndP_1,14.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:2547: naiṣadhaṃ yatsmṛtaṃ varṣaṃ harivarṣāya taṃ dadau /
GP12brndp1_u:2548: madhyamaṃ yatsumerostu dadau sa tadilāvṛtam // BndP_1,14.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:2549: nīlaṃ tu yatsmṛtaṃ varṣaṃ ramyāyaitaptitā dadau /
GP12brndp1_u:2550: śvetaṃ yaduttaraṃ tasmātpitrā dattaṃ hiraṇvate // BndP_1,14.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:2552: sālyavantaṃ tathā varṣaṃ bhadrāśvāya nyavedayat // BndP_1,14.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:2554: ityetāni mayoktāni nava varṣāṇi bhāgaśaḥ // BndP_1,14.52 //
GP12brndp1_u:2556: yathākramaṃ sa dharmātmā tatastu tapasi sthitaḥ // BndP_1,14.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:2557: ityetauḥ saptabhiḥ kṛtsnā saptadvīpā nive śitāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2558: priyavratasya putraistaiḥ pautaiḥ svāyaṃbhuvasya ca // BndP_1,14.54 //
GP12brndp1_u:2559: evaṃ varṣeṣu sarveṣu sanniveśāḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2560: kriyante pralaye vṛtte sapta saptasu pārthivaiḥ // BndP_1,14.55 //
GP12brndp1_u:2561: evaṃ svabhāvaḥ kalpānāṃ dvīpānāṃ ca niveśane /
GP12brndp1_u:2562: yāni kiṃpuruṣādyāni varṇāṇyaṣṭau śrutāni tu // BndP_1,14.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:2564: viparyayo na teṣvasti jarāmṛtyubhayaṃ na ca // BndP_1,14.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:2566: na teṣvasti yugāvasthā kṣetreṣvaṣṭāsu sarvaśaḥ // BndP_1,14.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:2572: himāhvaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ varṣaṃ bharatāya nyavedayat // BndP_1,14.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:2573: tasmāttu bhārataṃ varṣaṃ tasya nāmnā vidurbudhāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2576: putrasaṃkrāmitaśrīstu vanaṃ rājā viveśa saḥ // BndP_1,14.63 //
GP12brndp1_u:2580: pratīhāraḥ kulaṃ tasya nāmnā jajñe tadanvayaḥ // BndP_1,14.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:2582: unnetā pratihartustu bhūmā tasya sutaḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,14.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:2584: prastāvestu vibhuḥ putraḥ pṛthustasya suto 'bhavat // BndP_1,14.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:2585: pṛthoścāpi suto nakto naktasyāpi gayaḥ sutaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2586: gayasyāpi naraḥ putro narasyāpi suto virāṭ // BndP_1,14.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:2591: tasya putraśataṃ tvāsīdrājānaḥ sarva eva tu /
GP12brndp1_u:2594: teṣāṃ vaṃśaprasūtaistu bhukteyaṃ bhāratī purā // BndP_1,14.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:2598: evaṃ svāyaṃ bhuvaḥ sargo yenedaṃ pūritaṃ jagat // BndP_1,14.74 //
GP12brndp1_u:2601: teṣāṃ sṛṣṭiriyaṃ proktā yugaiḥ saha vivarttate // BndP_1,14.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:2602: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde priyavratavaṃśānukīrttanaṃ nāma catudaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:2605: papraccha niyataṃ sūtaṃ pṛthivyuda dhivistaram // BndP_1,15.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:2606: kati dvīpā samudrā vā pavatā vā kati smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2607: kiyanti caiva varṣāṇi teṣu nadyaśca kāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,15.2 //
GP12brndp1_u:2608: mahā bhūtapramāṇaṃ ca lokālokaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2610: etatprabūhi naḥ sarvaṃ vistareṇa yathārthataḥ // BndP_1,15.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:2613: saṃkhyāṃ caiva samudrāṇāṃ dvīpānāṃ caiva vistaram /
GP12brndp1_u:2615: na śakyante krameṇeha vaktuṃ yaiḥ satataṃ jagat /
GP12brndp1_u:2618: acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃstarkeṇa sādhayet // BndP_1,15.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:2630: jaṃbūdvīpasya vistārāt samena tu samantataḥ // BndP_1,15.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:2634: sarvarttuṣu sukhaścāpi niṣadhaḥ parvato mahān // BndP_1,15.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:2636: dvātriṃśacca sahasrāṇi vistīrṇaḥ sa ca mūrddhani // BndP_1,15.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:2640: pūrvatarḥ śvetavarṇaśca brāhmaṇastasya tena tat // BndP_1,15.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:2646: vṛttaḥ svabhāvataḥ prokto varṇataḥ parimāṇataḥ // BndP_1,15.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:2652: navaivaṃ tu sahasrāṇi vistīrṇaṃ sarvatastu tat // BndP_1,15.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:2655: varṣāṇi yāni ṣaṭ caiva teṣāṃ ye varṣaparvatāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2656: dve dve sahasre vistīrṇā yojanānāṃ samucchrayāt // BndP_1,15.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:2658: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi śataṃ dvāvāyatau girī // BndP_1,15.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:2659: nīlaśca niṣadhaścaiva tābhyāṃ hīnāstu ye pare /
GP12brndp1_u:2661: navatī dve aśītī dve sahasrāṇyāyatāstu teḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2662: teṣāṃ madhye janapadāstāni varṇāṇi sapta vai // BndP_1,15.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:2666: idaṃ haimavataṃ varṣaṃ bhārataṃ nāma viśrutam // BndP_1,15.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:2667: hemakūṭaṃ paraṃ hyasmā nnānnā kiṃṣurupaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:2670: ilāvṛtātpiraṃ nīlaṃ samyakaṃ nāma viśrutam // BndP_1,15.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:2672: hiraṇmayātparaṃ caiva śṛṅgavattaḥ kuru smṛtam // BndP_1,15.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:2673: dhanuḥsaṃsthe tu vijñeye dve varṣe dakṣiṇottare /
GP12brndp1_u:2674: dīrghāṇi tatra catvāri madhyamaṃ tadilāvṛtam // BndP_1,15.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:2675: arvāk ca niṣadhasyātha vedyarddhaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:2676: paraṃ nīlavato yacca vedyarddhaṃ tu taduttaram // BndP_1,15.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:2677: vedyarddhe dakṣiṇe trīṇi trīṇi varṣāṇi cottare /
GP12brndp1_u:2678: tayormadhye tu vijñeyo merurmadhya ilāvṛtam // BndP_1,15.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:2686: caturvaṇaḥ sa sauvarṇaḥ caturasraḥ samucchritaḥ // BndP_1,15.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:2702: sa tu meruḥ parivṛto bhuvanairbhūtabhāvanaiḥ // BndP_1,15.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:2710: tatra te śubhakarmāṇaḥ ketumālāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ // BndP_1,15.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:2711: tatra kālā narāḥ sarve mahāsattvā mahābalāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2714: īśvaro brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ kāmacārī manojavaḥ // BndP_1,15.55 //
GP12brndp1_u:2715: tasya pītvā phalarasaṃ jīvanti ca samāyutam /
GP12brndp1_u:2716: pārśve mālyavataścāpi pūrve 'pūrvā tu gaṇḍikā // BndP_1,15.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:2720: tatra te puruṣāḥ svetā mahotsāhā balānvitāḥ // BndP_1,15.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:2725: kālāmrasya rasaṃ pītvā sarve ca sthirayauvanāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2726: dakṣiṇena tu śvetasya nīlasyaivottareṇa ca // BndP_1,15.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:2727: varṣaṃ ramaṇakaṃ nāma jāyante tatra mānavāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2730: tatrāpi sumahānvṛkṣo nyagrodho rohito mahān // BndP_1,15.63 //
GP12brndp1_u:2731: tasyāpi te phalarasaṃ pibanto varttayanti vai /
GP12brndp1_u:2732: daśavarṣasahasrāṇi śatāni daśa pañca ca // BndP_1,15.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:2733: jīvanti te mahābhāgāḥ sadā tdṛṣṭā narottamāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2734: dakṣiṇe vai śṛṅgavataḥ śvetasyāpyuttareṇa ca // BndP_1,15.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:2735: varṣaṃ hairaṇvataṃ nāma yatra hairaṇvatī nadī /
GP12brndp1_u:2736: mahābalāḥ sutejaskā jāyante tatra mānavāḥ // BndP_1,15.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:2739: āyuḥ pramāṇaṃ jīvanti śatāni daśa pañca ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2741: tasya pītvā phalarasaṃ te jīvanti nirāmayāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2742: trīṇi śṛṅgavataḥ śṛṅgāṇyucchritāni mahānti ca // BndP_1,15.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:2745: uttare vai śṛṅgāvataḥ samudrasya ca dakṣiṇe /
GP12brndp1_u:2748: vastrāṇi ca prasūyante phaleṣvābharaṇāni ca // BndP_1,15.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:2752: ye kṣaranti sadā kṣīraṃ ṣaḍrasaṃ hyamṛtopamam // BndP_1,15.74 //
GP12brndp1_u:2758: teṣāṃ te kṣīriṇāṃ kṣīraṃ pibanti hyamṛto pamam // BndP_1,15.77 //
GP12brndp1_u:2759: mithunaṃ jāyate sadyaḥ samaṃ caiva vivarddhate /
GP12brndp1_u:2760: samaṃ śīlaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca priyatā caiva tatsamā // BndP_1,15.78 //
GP12brndp1_u:2764: jīvanti te mahāvīryā na cānyastrīniṣeviṇaḥ // BndP_1,15.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:2765: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvītīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde pṛthivyāyāmavistaro nāma pañcadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:2767: evameva nisargo vai varṣāṇāṃ bhārate śubhe /
GP12brndp1_u:2768: dṛṣṭaḥ paramatattvajñairbhūyaḥ kiṃ varṇayāmi vaḥ // BndP_1,16.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:2774: atra vo varṇayiṣyāmi varṣe 'smin bhārate prajāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2775: idaṃ tu madhyamaṃ citraṃ śubhāśubhaphalodayam // BndP_1,16.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:2777: varṣaṃ tadbhārataṃ nāma yatreyaṃ bhāratī prajā // BndP_1,16.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:2781: na khalvanyatra martyānāṃ bhūmau karma vidhīyate // BndP_1,16.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:2787: yojanānāṃ sahasre tu dvīpo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇottarāt // BndP_1,16.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:2791: pūrve kirātā hyasyānte paścime yavanāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,16.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:2792: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā madhye śūdrāśca bhāgaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2799: kṛtsnaṃ jayati yo hyenaṃ samrāḍityabhidhīyate // BndP_1,16.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:2800: ayaṃ lokastu vai samrāḍantarikṣaṃ virāṭ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:2801: svarāḍasau smṛto laukaḥ punarvakṣyāmi vistarāt // BndP_1,16.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:2805: teṣāṃ sahasraścānye parva tāstu samīpagāḥ // BndP_1,16.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:2813: anye tebhyo 'parijñātā hrasvāḥ svalapopajī vinaḥ // BndP_1,16.23 //
GP12brndp1_u:2815: pīyante yairimā nadyo gaṅgā siṃdhu sarasvatī // BndP_1,16.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:2817: irāvatī vitastā ca vipāśā devikā kuhūḥ // BndP_1,16.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:2818: gomatī dhūtapāpā ca budbudā ca dṛṣadvatī /
GP12brndp1_u:2819: kauśakī tridivā caiva niṣṭhīvī geḍakī tathā // BndP_1,16.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:2821: vedasmṛtirvedavatī vṛtraghnī siṃdhu reva ca // BndP_1,16.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:2824: kṣiprā hyavanti ca tathā pāriyātrāśrayāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2825: śoṇo mahānadaścaiva narmmadā surasā kriyā // BndP_1,16.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:2826: mandākinī daśārṇā ca citrakūṭā tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2827: tamasā pippalā śyenā karamodā piśācikā // BndP_1,16.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:2829: sanerujā śuktimatī maṅkutī tridivā kratuḥ // BndP_1,16.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:2831: tāpī payoṣṇī nirvindhyā sṛpā ca niṣadhā nadī // BndP_1,16.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:2832: veṇī vaitaraṇī caiva kṣiprā vālā kumudvatī /
GP12brndp1_u:2833: toyā caiva mahāgaurī durgā vānnaśilā tathā // BndP_1,16.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:2843: kṛpā palāśinī caiva śuktimatprabhavāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,16.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:2844: tāstu nadyaḥ sarasvatyaḥ sarvā gaṅgāḥ samudragāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2845: viśvasya mātaraḥ sarvā jagatpāpaharāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,16.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:2849: matsyāḥ kuśalyāḥ sauśalyāḥ kuntalāḥ kāśikośalāḥ // BndP_1,16.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:2853: pṛthivyāmapi kṛtsnāyāṃ sa pradeśo manoramaḥ // BndP_1,16.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:2854: tatra govardhanaṃ nāma puraṃ rāmeṇa nirmitam /
GP12brndp1_u:2855: rāmapriyātha svargīyā vṛkṣa divyāsta thauṣadhīḥ // BndP_1,16.44 //
GP12brndp1_u:2873: tataḥ plavaṅgavo jñeyā maladā malavartikāḥ // BndP_1,16.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:2889: nāsikāścaiva ye cānye ye caivāntaranarmadāḥ // BndP_1,16.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:2901: apaprāva raṇāścaiva ūrṇā darvāḥ sahūhukāḥ // BndP_1,16.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:2903: catvāri bhārate varṣe yugāni ṛṣayo 'bruvan // BndP_1,16.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:2904: kṛtaṃ tretāyugaṃ caiva dvāparaṃ tiṣyameva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2909: yacca kiṃpuruṣaṃ varṣaṃ harivarṣaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2910: ācakṣva no yathātattvaṃ kīrttitaṃ bhārataṃ tvayā // BndP_1,17.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:2918: varṣe kiṃpuruṣe puṇye vṛkṣo madhuvahaḥ śubhaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2919: tasya kiṃpuruṣāḥ sarve 'piban hi rasamuttamam // BndP_1,17.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:2923: harivarṣe narāḥ sarve pibantīkṣurasaṃ śupham // BndP_1,17.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:2925: harivarṣe tu jīvanti sarve muditamānasāḥ // BndP_1,17.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:2926: na jarā bādhate tatra na mriyante ca te 'cirāt /
GP12brndp1_u:2927: madhyamaṃ yanmayā proktaṃ nāmnā varṣamilāvṛtam // BndP_1,17.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:2928: na tatra sūryastapati na tu jīryanti mānavāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2929: candrasūryai sanakṣatrau na prakāśāvilā vṛte // BndP_1,17.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:2936: āyuḥ pramāṇaṃ jīvanti ye tu varṣa ilāvṛte /
GP12brndp1_u:2947: teṣāṃ madhye mahāmeruḥ svaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // BndP_1,17.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:2957: tasya nāmnā samā khyāto jambūdvīpo vanaspateḥ // BndP_1,17.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:2959: utsedho vṛkṣarājasya divaṃ spṛśati sarvataḥ // BndP_1,17.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:2963: tasyā jambvāḥ phalaraso nadī bhūtvā prasarppati // BndP_1,17.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:2965: taṃ pibanti sadā tdṛṣṭā jaṃbūrasamilāvṛte // BndP_1,17.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:2966: jaṃbūphalarase pīte na jarā bādhate tu tān /
GP12brndp1_u:2967: na kṣudhā na śramaścāpi na mṛtyurna ca tandri tam // BndP_1,17.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:2969: indragopakasaṃkāśaṃ jāyate bhāsvaraṃ tu tat // BndP_1,17.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:2971: skannaṃ bhavati tacchubhraṃ kanakaṃ devabhūṣaṇam // BndP_1,17.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:2972: teṣāṃ mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca dikṣu sarvāsu sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2975: hemakūṭe tu gandharvā vijñeyāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ // BndP_1,17.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:2979: daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ car śvetaḥ parvata ucyate // BndP_1,17.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:2981: navasveteṣu varṣeṣu yathābhāgaṃ sthiteṣu vai // BndP_1,17.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:2984: na saṃkhyā parisaṃkhyātuṃ śraddheyā tu bubhūṣatām // BndP_1,17.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:2985: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde kiṃpuruṣādivarṣavarṇanaṃ nāma saptadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:2987: madhye himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe kailāso nāma parvataḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2996: candraprabho nāma giriḥ suśubhro ratnasannibhaḥ // BndP_1,18.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:2997: tasya pāde mahāddivyaṃ svacchodaṃ nāma tatsaraḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3000: tasmin girau nivasati maṇibhadraḥ sahānugaḥ // BndP_1,18.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:3002: puṇyā mandākinī caiva nadī svacchodakā ca yā // BndP_1,18.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:3005: manaḥ śilāmayaṃ divyaṃ citrāṅgaṃ parvataṃ prati /
GP12brndp1_u:3006: lohito hemaśṛṅgaśca giriḥ sūryaprabho mahān // BndP_1,18.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:3007: tasya pāde mahaddivyaṃ lohitaṃ nāma tatsaraḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3008: tasmātpuṇyaḥ prabhavati lauhityaḥ sa nado mahān // BndP_1,18.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:3009: devāraṇyaṃ viśokaṃ ca tasya tīre mahadvanam /
GP12brndp1_u:3010: tasmingirau nivasati yakṣo maṇidharo vaśī // BndP_1,18.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:3015: tasya pāde kalaḥ puṇyaṃ mānasaṃ siddhasevitam /
GP12brndp1_u:3017: tasyāstīre vana divyaṃ vaibhrājaṃ nāma viśrutam /
GP12brndp1_u:3026: muñjavāstu mahādivyo durgaḥ śailo himācitaḥ // BndP_1,18.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:3028: tasyā pādātprabhavati śailodaṃ nāma tatsaraḥ // BndP_1,18.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:3030: sā cakṣuḥ sītayormadhye praviṣṭā lavaṇodadhim // BndP_1,18.22 //
GP12brndp1_u:3031: tasyāstīre vanaṃ divyaṃ viśrutaṃ surabhīti vai /
GP12brndp1_u:3034: hiraṇyaśṛṅgaḥ sumahān divyo maṇimayo giriḥ // BndP_1,18.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:3036: ramyaṃ bindusaro nāma yatra rājā bhagīrathaḥ // BndP_1,18.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:3038: divaṃ yāsyanti te burve gaṅgatoyapariplutāḥ // BndP_1,18.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:3040: tatra tripayagā devī prathamaṃ tu pratiṣṭhitā /
GP12brndp1_u:3043: tatreṣṭvā tu gataḥ siddhiṃ śakraḥ sarvaiḥ suraiḥ saha // BndP_1,18.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:3045: dṛśyate bhāsvaro rātrau devī tripathagā tu sā // BndP_1,18.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:3048: tasyā ye bindavaḥ kecit kruddhāyāḥ patitā bhuvi /
GP12brndp1_u:3049: kṛtaṃ tu tairbidusarastato bindusaraḥ smṛtam // BndP_1,18.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:3050: tato nirūddhā sā devī bhavena smayatā kila /
GP12brndp1_u:3053: jñātvā tamyā abhiprāyaṃ krūraṃ devyāścikīrṣitam // BndP_1,18.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:3057: etasminneva kāle tu dṛṣṭvā rājānamagrataḥ // BndP_1,18.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:3059: anena toṣitaścāhaṃ nadyarthaṃ pūrvameva tu // BndP_1,18.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:3060: buddhāsya varadānaṃ ca kopaṃ niyatavāṃstu saḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3061: brahmaṇo vacanaṃ śrutvā dhāraya svarṇadīmiti // BndP_1,18.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:3065: tisraḥ ptācīmimukhaṃ pratīcīṃ tisra eva tu // BndP_1,18.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:3067: nalinī hlādinī caiva pāvanī caiva prācyagāḥ // BndP_1,18.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:3071: saptaitā bhāvayantīdaṃ himāhvaṃ varṣameva tu // BndP_1,18.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:3072: prasūtāḥ sapta nadyastāḥ śubhā bindu sarodbhavāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3074: upagacchanti tāḥ sarvā yato varṣati vāsavaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3077: kṛtvā tridhā siṃhavantaṃ sītāgātpaścimoda dhim // BndP_1,18.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:3081: daradāṃśca sakāśmīrān gāndharān raurasān kuhān // BndP_1,18.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:3098: tatastu pāvanī cāpi prācīmeva diśaṃ yayau /
GP12brndp1_u:3103: tatastu nalinī prāyāt prācīmāśāṃ javena tu // BndP_1,18.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:3105: pūrvandeśāṃśca sevantī bhittvā sā bahudhāgirīn // BndP_1,18.59 //
GP12brndp1_u:3110: upagacchanti tāḥ sarvā yato varṣati vāsavaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3111: vakvaukasāyāstīre tu vanaṃ surabhi viśrutam // BndP_1,18.62 //
GP12brndp1_u:3115: kuberānucarā hyete catvārastu samāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,18.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:3121: saro viṣṇupadaṃ nāma niṣadhe parvatottame // BndP_1,18.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:3122: tasmāddvayaṃ prabhavati gāndharvī nākulī ca taiḥ /

GP12brndp1_u:3125: payodaṃ tu saro nīle suśubhraṃ puṇḍarīkavat // BndP_1,18.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:3128: jyotsnā ca mṛgākāmā ca tasmāddve saṃbabhūvatuḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3133: tebhyaḥ śāntā ya mādhvī ca dve nadyau saṃbabhūvatuḥ // BndP_1,18.73 //
GP12brndp1_u:3134: yāni kiṃpuruṣādyāni teṣu devo na varṣati /
GP12brndp1_u:3143: āyatāste mahāśailāḥ samudraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ prati // BndP_1,18.78 //
GP12brndp1_u:3145: tatra saṃvarttako nāma so 'gniḥ pibati tajjalam // BndP_1,18.79 //
GP12brndp1_u:3147: dvādaśaite praviṣṭā hi parvatā lavaṇodadhim // BndP_1,18.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:3150: bhāratasya tu varṣasya bhedāste nava kīrttitāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3155: vasaṃti nānājātīni teṣu varṣeṣu tāni vai /
GP12brndp1_u:3156: ityeṣā dhārayantīdaṃ pṛthvī viśvaṃ jagatsthitam // BndP_1,18.84 //
GP12brndp1_u:3157: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde jambūdvīpavarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:3160: śṛṇutemaṃ yathātattvaṃ bruvato me dvijottamāḥ // BndP_1,19.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:3164: tatra puṇyā janapadāścirānna mriyate janaḥ // BndP_1,19.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:3165: kṛta eva ca durbhikṣaṃ jarāvyādhibhayaṃ kutaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3166: tatrāpi parvatāḥ puṇyāḥ saptaiva maṇibhūṣaṇāḥ // BndP_1,19.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:3168: blakṣadvīpādiṣu tveṣu sapta sapta tu pañcasu // BndP_1,19.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:3170: plakṣadvīpe tu vakṣyāmi saptadvīpān mahā balān // BndP_1,19.6 //
GP12brndp1_u:3172: khyāyate yasya nāmnā tu varṣaṃ gomedasaṃjñitam // BndP_1,19.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:3178: chandamṛtyuḥ purā tasmindundubhiḥ sāditaḥ suraiḥ // BndP_1,19.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:3180: pañcamaḥ somako nāma devairyatrāmṛtaṃ purā // BndP_1,19.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:3182: ṣaṣṭastu sumanā nāma saptamarṣabha ucyate // BndP_1,19.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:3184: vaibhrājaḥ saptamastatra bhrājiṣṇuḥ sphāṭiko mahān // BndP_1,19.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:3186: teṣāṃ varṣāṇi vakṣyāmi nāmatastu yathākramam // BndP_1,19.14 //
GP12brndp1_u:3188: candrasya śiśiraṃ nāma nāradasya sukhodayam // BndP_1,19.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:3190: kṣemakaṃ vṛṣabhasyāpi vaibhrājasya dhruvaṃ tathā // BndP_1,19.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:3192: viharanti ramante ca dṛśyamānāśca taiḥ saha // BndP_1,19.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:3196: amṛtā sukṛtā caiva saptaitāḥ saritāṃ varāḥ // BndP_1,19.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:3198: bahūdakā hyoghavatyo yato varṣati vāsavaḥ // BndP_1,19.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:3199: tāḥ pibanti sadā hṛṣṭā nadījanapadāstu te /
GP12brndp1_u:3200: śubhāḥ śāntabhayāścaiva pramudaṃ śaiśirāḥ śivāḥ // BndP_1,19.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:3204: avasarpiṇī na teṣvasti tathaivotsarpiṇī na ca // BndP_1,19.23 //
GP12brndp1_u:3206: tretāyugasamaḥ kālaḥ sarvadā tatra varttate // BndP_1,19.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:3217: plakṣo nāma mahāvṛkṣastasya nāmnā sa ucyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3218: sa tatra pūjyate sthāne madhye janapadasya ha // BndP_1,19.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:3226: tatrāpi parvatāḥ sapta vijñeyā ratnayonayaḥ // BndP_1,19.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:3228: prathamaḥ sūryasaṃkāśaḥ kumudo nāma parvataḥ // BndP_1,19.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:3230: dvitīyaḥ parvataścātra hyuttamo nāma viśrutaḥ // BndP_1,19.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:3232: tṛtiyaḥ parvatastatra balāhaka iti śrutaḥ // BndP_1,19.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:3234: caturthaḥ parvato droṇo yatra sā vai sahoṣadhiḥ // BndP_1,19.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:3244: teṣāṃ varṣāṇi vakṣyāmi sarpaiva tu śubhāni vai // BndP_1,19.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:3246: balāhakasya jīmūtaṃ droṇasya haritaṃ smṛtam // BndP_1,19.44 //
GP12brndp1_u:3247: kaṅkasya vaidyutaṃ nāma mahiṣasya ca mānasam /
GP12brndp1_u:3248: kakudaḥ supradaṃ nāma saptaitāni tu saptadhā // BndP_1,19.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:3250: jyotiḥ śāntistathā tuṣṭā candrā śukrā vimocanī // BndP_1,19.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:3251: nivṛttiḥ saptamī tāsāṃ prativarṣaṃ tu tāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3254: ityeṣa saṃniveśo vaḥ śālmalasya prakīrttitaḥ // BndP_1,19.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:3258: vistarācchālmalasvaiva same na tu samantataḥ // BndP_1,19.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:3260: yathāśrutaṃ yathānyāyaṃ bruvato me nibodhata // BndP_1,19.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:3265: kuśadvīpe tu vijñeyaḥ parvato vidrumaśca yaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3270: mandā iti hyapā nāma mandaro dāraṇādayam // BndP_1,19.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:3272: udbhidaṃ prathamaṃ varṣaṃ dvitīyaṃ veṇumaṇḍalam // BndP_1,19.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:3273: tṛtīyaṃ vai rathākāraṃ caturthaṃ lavaṇaṃ samṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:3274: pañcamaṃ dhṛtimadvarṣaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ varṣaṃ prabhākaram // BndP_1,19.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:3275: saptamaṃ kapilaṃ nāma sarve te varṣa bhāvakāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3278: na teṣu dasyavaḥ saṃti mleccha jātaya eva ca // BndP_1,19.60 //
GP12brndp1_u:3279: gauraprāyo janaḥ sarvaḥ kramācca mriyate tathā /
GP12brndp1_u:3280: tatrāpi nadyaḥ saptaiva dhūtapāpāśivā tathā // BndP_1,19.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:3283: abhigacchanti tāḥ sarvā yato varṣati vāsavaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3286: ityeṣa sanniveśo vaḥ kuśadvīpasya kīrttitaḥ // BndP_1,19.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:3288: kuśadvīpasya vistārāddviguṇaḥ sa tu vai smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,19.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:3290: tasmindvīpe nagaśreṣṭhaḥ kraiñcastu prathamo giriḥ // BndP_1,19.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:3296: ete ratnamayāḥ sapta kraiñcadvīpasya parvatāḥ // BndP_1,19.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:3300: kraiñcasya kuśalo deśo vāmanasya manonugaḥ // BndP_1,19.71 //
GP12brndp1_u:3306: tatrāpi nadyaḥ saptaiva prativarṣa smṛtāḥ śubhāḥ // BndP_1,19.74 //
GP12brndp1_u:3308: khyātiśca puṇḍarīkā ca gaṅgāḥ saptavidhāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,19.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:3310: abhigacchanti tāḥ sarvā vipulāḥ subahūdakāḥ // BndP_1,19.76 //
GP12brndp1_u:3316: nisargo yaḥ prajānāṃ tu saṃhāro yaśca tāsu vai // BndP_1,19.79 //
GP12brndp1_u:3318: śṛṇudhvaṃ tu yathātathyaṃ bruvato me yathārthavat // BndP_1,19.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:3320: parivārya samudraṃ sa dadhimaṇḍodakaṃ sthitaḥ // BndP_1,19.81 //
GP12brndp1_u:3322: kuta eva ca durbhikṣaṃ jarāvyādhibhayaṃ kutaḥ // BndP_1,19.82 //
GP12brndp1_u:3324: ratnākarāstathā nadyasteṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu // BndP_1,19.83 //
GP12brndp1_u:3326: prāgāyataḥ sa sauvarṇo hyudayo nāma parvataḥ // BndP_1,19.84 //
GP12brndp1_u:3327: vṛṣṭyarthaṃ jaladāstatra prabhaṃvati ca yānti ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3330: tato varṣaṃ prabhavati varṣākāle prajāsviha // BndP_1,19.86 //
GP12brndp1_u:3332: revatī divi nakṣatraṃ pitāmahakṛto vidhiḥ // BndP_1,19.87 //
GP12brndp1_u:3338: kesarī kesarayuto yato vāyuḥ prajāpatiḥ // BndP_1,19.90 //
GP12brndp1_u:3341: raivatasya tu kaumāraṃ śyāmasya ca maṇīvakam /
GP12brndp1_u:3342: astasyāpi śubhaṃ varṣaṃ vijñeyaṃ kusumottaram // BndP_1,19.92 //
GP12brndp1_u:3344: dvīpasya parimāṇaṃ tu hrasvadīrghatvameva ca // BndP_1,19.93 //
GP12brndp1_u:3346: śāko nāma mahotsedhastasya pūjyā mahānugāḥ // BndP_1,19.94 //
GP12brndp1_u:3349: sukumārī kumārī ca nalinī veṇukā ca yā /
GP12brndp1_u:3350: ikṣuśca veṇukā caiva gabhastiḥ saptamī tathā // BndP_1,19.96 //
GP12brndp1_u:3352: sahasraśaḥ samākhyātā yato varṣati vāsavaḥ // BndP_1,19.97 //
GP12brndp1_u:3353: na tāsāṃ nāmadheyāni parimāṇaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3354: śakyaṃ vai parisaṃkhyātuṃ puṇyāstāḥ sariduttamāḥ // BndP_1,19.98 //
GP12brndp1_u:3355: tāḥ pibanti sadā hṛṣṭā nadīrjanapadāstu te /
GP12brndp1_u:3364: varṇāśramasamākīrṇā deśāste sapta vai smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,19.103 //
GP12brndp1_u:3367: na teṣu lobho māyā vā hīrṣāsūyākṛtaḥ kutaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3368: viparyayo na teṣvasti kālātsvābhāvikaṃ param // BndP_1,19.105 //
GP12brndp1_u:3369: karāvāptirna teṣvasti na daṇḍo na ca daṇḍyakāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3370: svadharmeṇaiva dharma jñāste rakṣanti parasparam // BndP_1,19.106 //
GP12brndp1_u:3374: puṣkareṇa tu dvīpena vṛtaḥ kṣīrodako bahiḥ // BndP_1,19.108 //
GP12brndp1_u:3376: puṣkare parvataḥ śrīmāneka eva mahāśilaḥ // BndP_1,19.109 //
GP12brndp1_u:3378: dvīpasya tasya pūrvarddhe citrasānuḥ sthito mahān // BndP_1,19.110 //
GP12brndp1_u:3382: sthito velāsamīpe tu navacandra ivoditaḥ // BndP_1,19.112 //
GP12brndp1_u:3384: tāvadeva ca vistīrṇaḥ sarvataḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ // BndP_1,19.113 //
GP12brndp1_u:3386: eka eva mahāsāraḥ sanniveśo dvidhā kṛtaḥ // BndP_1,19.114 //
GP12brndp1_u:3389: tasmindvīpe smṛtau dvau tu puṇyau janapadau śubhau /
GP12brndp1_u:3390: abhito mānasasyātha parvatasya tu maṇḍale // BndP_1,19.116 //
GP12brndp1_u:3391: mahāvītaṃ tu yadvarṣa bāhyato mānasasya tat /
GP12brndp1_u:3396: adhamottamā na teṣvasti tulyāste rūpaśīlataḥ // BndP_1,19.119 //
GP12brndp1_u:3397: na tatra dasyurdamako nerṣyāsūyā bhayaṃ tathā /
GP12brndp1_u:3398: nigraho na ca daṇḍo 'sti na lobho na parigrahaḥ // BndP_1,19.120 //
GP12brndp1_u:3399: satyānṛtaṃ na tatrāsti dharmādharmauṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3400: varṇāśramau vā vārtā vā pāśupālyaṃ vaṇikpathaḥ // BndP_1,19.121 //
GP12brndp1_u:3401: trayī vidyā daṇḍanītiḥ śuśrūṣā śilpameva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3403: na tatra varṣaṃ nadyo vā śītoṣṇaṃ vāpi vidyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3407: ityeṣa dhātakīkhaṇḍe mahā vīte tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3414: apāṃ caiva samudrekātsāmudra iti saṃjñitaḥ // BndP_1,19.128 //
GP12brndp1_u:3416: tasmādvarṣamiti proktaṃ prajānāṃ sukhadaṃ yataḥ // BndP_1,19.129 //
GP12brndp1_u:3418: ratiprabadhanātmiddhaṃ varṣaṃ tatteṣu tena vai // BndP_1,19.130 //
GP12brndp1_u:3424: mahodadhigataṃ toyaṃ svata udricyate tathā // BndP_1,19.133 //
GP12brndp1_u:3428: daśottarāṇi pañcaiva hyaṅgulāni śatāni ca // BndP_1,19.135 //
GP12brndp1_u:3429: apāṃ vṛddhiḥ kṣayo dṛṣṭaḥ sāmudrīṇāṃ tu parvasu /
GP12brndp1_u:3432: aparvāṇastu girayaḥ parvabhiḥ parvatāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,19.137 //
GP12brndp1_u:3434: śālmaliḥ śālmale dvīpe pūjyate sumahāvrataiḥ // BndP_1,19.138 //
GP12brndp1_u:3436: kraiñcadvīpe giriḥ kaiñco madhye janapadasya ha // BndP_1,19.139 //
GP12brndp1_u:3437: śākadvīpe drumaḥ śākastasya nāmnā sa ucyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3438: nyagrodhaḥ puṣkaradvīpe tatratyaiḥ sa namaskṛtaḥ // BndP_1,19.140 //
GP12brndp1_u:3440: tasminni vasati brahmā sādhyaiḥ sārddhaṃ prajāpatiḥ // BndP_1,19.141 //
GP12brndp1_u:3442: sa tatra pūjyate caiva deverdevotamotamaḥ // BndP_1,19.142 //
GP12brndp1_u:3444: dvīpeṣu teṣu sarveṣu prajānāṃ kramatastu vai // BndP_1,19.143 //
GP12brndp1_u:3445: sarvaśo brahmavaryeṇa satyena ca damena ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3450: sa viṣṇoḥ sacivo devaḥ sa pitā sa pitāmahaḥ // BndP_1,19.146 //
GP12brndp1_u:3452: ṣaḍrasaṃ sumahāvīryaṃ bhuñjate tu prajāḥ sadā // BndP_1,19.147 //
GP12brndp1_u:3460: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi daśa tasyocchrayaḥ samṛtaḥ // BndP_1,19.151 //
GP12brndp1_u:3464: lokavistāramātraṃ tu hyalokaḥ sarvato bahiḥ // BndP_1,19.153 //
GP12brndp1_u:3470: etāvāneva vijñeyo lokāntaścaiva yaḥ paraḥ // BndP_1,19.156 //
GP12brndp1_u:3480: bāhyato ghanato yasya tiryagūrddhvaṃ tu maṇḍalam // BndP_1,19.161 //
GP12brndp1_u:3484: ghanavātaṃ tathākāśo dadhānaḥ khalu tiṣṭhati // BndP_1,19.163 //
GP12brndp1_u:3486: mahāśca so 'pyanantena hyavyaktena tu dhāryate // BndP_1,19.164 //
GP12brndp1_u:3496: mahato devadevasya maryādā yā vyavasthitāḥ // BndP_1,19.169 //
GP12brndp1_u:3498: te lokā ityabhihitā jagatasca na saṃśayaḥ // BndP_1,19.170 //
GP12brndp1_u:3504: vicitrā jagataḥ sā vai prakṛtirbrahmaṇaḥ sthitā // BndP_1,19.173 //
GP12brndp1_u:3508: mānasasya tu dehasya anantasya dvijottamāḥ // BndP_1,19.175 //
GP12brndp1_u:3509: kṣayo vā pariṇāmo vā anto vāpi na vidyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3510: ananta eṣa sarvatra evaṃ jñāneṣu paṭhyate // BndP_1,19.176 //
GP12brndp1_u:3512: yaḥ padmanābhanāmnā tu tatkārtsnyena ca kīrttitaḥ // BndP_1,19.177 //
GP12brndp1_u:3513: sa eva sarvatra gataḥ sarvasthāneṣu pūjyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3514: bhūmau rasātale caiva ākāśe pavane 'nale // BndP_1,19.178 //
GP12brndp1_u:3515: arṇaveṣu ca sarveṣu divi caiva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3516: tathā tamasi vijñeya eṣa eva mahādyutiḥ // BndP_1,19.179 //
GP12brndp1_u:3518: sarvalokeṣu lokeśa ijyate bahudhā prabhuḥ // BndP_1,19.180 //
GP12brndp1_u:3528: bhūtebhyaḥ paratastebhyo vyālokā sā dharā smṛtā // BndP_1,19.185 //
GP12brndp1_u:3530: pātre mahati pātrāṇi yathaivāntargatāni tu // BndP_1,19.186 //
GP12brndp1_u:3532: tathā hyāloka ākāśe bhedāstvantargatā matāḥ // BndP_1,19.187 //
GP12brndp1_u:3536: pratyā khyāya tu bhūtāni kāryotparttina vidyate // BndP_1,19.189 //
GP12brndp1_u:3539: ityeṣa saṃniveśo vai mayā prokto vibhāgaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3546: etāvadeva śrotavyaṃ saṃniveśe tu pārtheve // BndP_1,19.194 //
GP12brndp1_u:3552: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi kṛthivyā vai vicakṣaṇāḥ // BndP_1,19.197 //
GP12brndp1_u:3553: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde plakṣādidvīpavarṇanaṃ nāmaikonaviṃśatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:3570: evaṃ matamanantasya bhautikasya na vidyate // BndP_1,20.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:3572: bhūmirjalamathā kāśamiti yā yā paraṃparā // BndP_1,20.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:3576: prathamaṃ tatvalaṃ nāma sutalaṃ tu tataḥ param // BndP_1,20.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:3578: tator'vākca talaṃ nāma parataśca rasātalam // BndP_1,20.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:3583: ṣaṣṭhaḥ śilāmayo jñeyaḥ sauvarṇaḥ saptamaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3586: puraṃ ca śaṅkukarṇasya kabandhasya ca mandiram // BndP_1,20.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:3588: rākṣasasya ca bhīmasya śūladantasya cālayam // BndP_1,20.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:3590: dhanañjayasya ca puraṃ nāgendrasya mahātmanaḥ // BndP_1,20.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:3591: kāliyasya ca nāgasya nagaraṃ kauśikasya ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3593: tale jñeyāni prathame kṛṣṇabhaume na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3594: dvitīye sutale viprā daityendrasya ca rakṣasaḥ // BndP_1,20.20 //

GP12brndp1_u:4181: tenāsau taraṇirdevo bhāsvatā sarpate divi // BndP_1,22.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:4183: dhruve tau bhrāmyate raśmī ca cakrayugayostu vai // BndP_1,22.76 //
GP12brndp1_u:4185: yugākṣakoṭī te tasya dakṣiṇe syandanasya hi // BndP_1,22.77 //
GP12brndp1_u:4187: bhramantamanugacchetāṃ dhruvaṃ raśmī tu tāvubhau // BndP_1,22.78 //
GP12brndp1_u:4189: kīlāsaktā yathā rajjurbhraṃmate sarvato diśam // BndP_1,22.79 //
GP12brndp1_u:4191: varddhate dakṣiṇe caiva bhramato maṇḍalāni tu // BndP_1,22.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:4193: dhruveṇa pragṛhītau vai tau raśmī nayato ravim // BndP_1,22.81 //
GP12brndp1_u:4194: ākṛṣyete yadā tau vai dhruveṇa sama dhiṣṭhitau /
GP12brndp1_u:4195: tadā so 'bhyantare sūryo bhramate maṇḍalāni tu // BndP_1,22.82 //
GP12brndp1_u:4197: dhruveṇa mucyamānābhyāṃ raśmibhyāṃ punareva tu // BndP_1,22.83 //
GP12brndp1_u:4198: tathaiva bāhyataḥ sūryo bhramate maṇḍalāni tu /
GP12brndp1_u:4199: udveṣāṭayansa vegena maṇḍalāni tu gacchati // BndP_1,22.84 //
GP12brndp1_u:4200: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde devagrahānukīrtanaṃ nāma dvāviṃśatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:4204: ete vasaṃti vai sūrye dvau dvau māsau krameṇa tu /
GP12brndp1_u:4210: ete vasaṃti vai sūryye madhumādhavayoḥ sadā /
GP12brndp1_u:4212: tathā vasiṣṭho vikhyātaḥ sahajanyā ca menakā /
GP12brndp1_u:4213: rākṣasau ca samākhyātau pauruṣeyo vadhastathā // BndP_1,23.6 //
GP12brndp1_u:4217: tataḥ sūrye punastvanyā nivasaṃtīha devatāḥ // BndP_1,23.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:4221: pramlocā iti vikhyātānumloceti ca te ubhe // BndP_1,23.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:4225: parjanyaścaiva pūṣā ca bhāradvājaḥ sagautamaḥ // BndP_1,23.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:4227: viśvācī ca ghṛtācī ca ubhe te śubhalakṣaṇe // BndP_1,23.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:4229: ścenajicca suṣeṇaśca senīrgrāma ṇīśca tau // BndP_1,23.14 //
GP12brndp1_u:4231: vasaṃtyete tu vai sūrye sadaivāśvinakartike // BndP_1,23.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:4232: haimantikau tu dvau māsau vasaṃti ca divākare /
GP12brndp1_u:4233: aṃśo bhagaśca dvāvaitau kaśyapaśya kratuśca ha // BndP_1,23.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:4239: sahe caiva sahasye ca vasaṃtyete divākare // BndP_1,23.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:4250: ete devā vasaṃtyarke dvau dvau māsau krameṇa tu /
GP12brndp1_u:4253: grathitaiḥ svairvacobhiśca stuvanti hyṛṣayo ravim // BndP_1,23.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:4256: sarpā vahanti vai sūryaṃ yātudhānāstu yānti ca /
GP12brndp1_u:4261: ityete nivasaṃtīha dvau dvau māsau divākare // BndP_1,23.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:4263: grāmaṇyaśca tathā yakṣā yātudhānāśca mukhyaśaḥ // BndP_1,23.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:4264: ete tapanti varṣanti bhānti vānti sṛjanti ca /
GP12brndp1_u:4265: bhūtānāṃ caśubhaṃ karma vyapohanti prakīrttitāḥ // BndP_1,23.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:4267: duritaṃ supracārāṇāṃ vyapohanti kvaci tkvacit // BndP_1,23.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:4269: varṣantaśca tapantaśca hlādayantaśca vai prajāḥ // BndP_1,23.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:4272: atītānāgatānāṃ ca varttante sāṃprataṃ ca ye /
GP12brndp1_u:4273: evaṃ vasaṃti vai sūrye saptakāste caturdaśa /
GP12brndp1_u:4275: grīṣme ca varṣāsu ca muñcamāno gharmaṃ himaṃ varṣa dinaṃ niśāṃ ca /
GP12brndp1_u:4276: gacchatyasāvṛtuvaśātparivṛttaraśmirdevān pitṝṃśca manujāṃśca hi tarpayanvai // BndP_1,23.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:4277: prīṇāti devānamṛtena sūryaḥ somaṃ suṣumṇena ca varddhayitvā /
GP12brndp1_u:4278: śukle tu pūrṇaṃ divasakrameṇa taṃ kṛṣṇapakṣe vibudhāḥ pibanti // BndP_1,23.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:4279: pītaṃ ca somaṃ hi kalāvaśiṣṭaṃ kṛṣṇakṣaye raśmibhirakṣarantam /
GP12brndp1_u:4280: sudhāmṛtaṃ tatpitaraḥ pibanti devāśca saumyāśca tathaiva kāvyāḥ // BndP_1,23.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:4283: tṛptiśca śukle sudhayā surāṇāṃ pakṣe ca kṛṣṇe sudhayā pitaṇām /
GP12brndp1_u:4284: annena śaśvacca dadhāti martyānsuryastapaṃstānsubibhartti gobhiḥ // BndP_1,23.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:4286: visargakāle visṛjaṃśca tāḥ punarbibhartti śaśvatsavitā carācaram // BndP_1,23.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:4287: harirharidbhirhri yate turaṅgamaiḥ pibatyathāpo haribhiḥ sahasradhā /
GP12brndp1_u:4288: tataḥ pramuñcatyapi tāstvasau hariḥ samūhyamāno haribhisturaṅgamaiḥ // BndP_1,23.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:4304: vāmadakṣiṇato yuktā daśa tena carantyasau // BndP_1,23.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:4308: apāṃ garṇātsamutpanno rathaḥ sāśvaḥ sasārathiḥ // BndP_1,23.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:4314: yajuścaṇḍamanāścaiva vṛṣo vājī naro hayaḥ // BndP_1,23.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:4316: ityete nāmabhiḥ sarve daśa candramaso hayāḥ // BndP_1,23.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:4317: ete candramasaṃ devaṃ vahanti saha dīkṣayā /
GP12brndp1_u:4318: devaiḥ parivṛtaḥ somaḥ pitṛbhiścaiva gacchati // BndP_1,23.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:4322: kṣīṇaṃ pañcadaśāhaṃ tu raśminaikena bhāskaraḥ // BndP_1,23.60 //
GP12brndp1_u:4324: suṣumṇāpyāyamānasya śuklā varddhanti vai kalāḥ // BndP_1,23.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:4325: tasmāddhrasaṃti vai kṛṣṇe śukle svāpyāyayanti tam /
GP12brndp1_u:4328: evamāpyāyitaḥ somaḥ śukla pakṣe dinakramāt // BndP_1,23.63 //
GP12brndp1_u:4334: ekāṃ rātriṃ suraiḥ sarvaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ sarṣibhiḥ saha // BndP_1,23.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:4336: prakṣīyante pidṛdevaiḥ pīyamānāḥ kalāḥ kramāt // BndP_1,23.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:4338: trayaśca trisahasrāśca devāḥ somaṃ pibanti vai // BndP_1,23.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:4339: ityetaiḥ pīyamānasya kṛṣṇā varddhati vai kalāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4340: kṣīyanti tasmācchuklāśca kṛṣṇā āpyāyayanti ca // BndP_1,23.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:4342: pītvārddha māsaṃ gacchanti cāmāvāsyāṃ surottamāḥ // BndP_1,23.70 //
GP12brndp1_u:4346: pibanti dvilavaṃ kālaṃ śiṣṭāstasya kalāstu yāḥ // BndP_1,23.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:4348: tāṃ svadhāṃ māsatṛptyai ca pītvā gacchanti te 'mṛtam // BndP_1,23.73 //
GP12brndp1_u:4352: kāvyaścaiva tu ye proktāḥ pitaraḥ sarva eva te // BndP_1,23.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:4353: saṃvatsarāstu vai kāvyāḥ pañcābdā ye dvicaiḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4354: saumyāstu ṛtuvo jñeyā māsā barhiṣadaḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,23.76 //
GP12brndp1_u:4356: pitṛbhiḥ pīyamānasya pañcadaśyāṃ kalā tu vai // BndP_1,23.77 //
GP12brndp1_u:4358: amāvāsyāṃ tadā tasya tata āpūryate paraḥ // BndP_1,23.78 //
GP12brndp1_u:4359: vṛddhakṣayau vai pakṣādau ṣoḍaśyāṃ śaśinaḥ smṛtā /
GP12brndp1_u:4362: teyatejomayaḥ śubhraḥ somaputrasya vai rathaḥ // BndP_1,23.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:4366: śvetaḥ piśaṅgaḥ sāraṅgo nīlaḥ pīto vilohitaḥ // BndP_1,23.82 //
GP12brndp1_u:4377: kārṣṇāyasaṃ samāruhya syandanaṃ yāti vai śanaiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4378: svarbhānośca tathaivāśvāḥ kṛṣṇā hyaṣṭau manojavāḥ // BndP_1,23.88 //
GP12brndp1_u:4379: rathaṃ tamomayaṃ tasya sakṛdyuktā vahaṃ tyuta /
GP12brndp1_u:4380: ādityānniḥsṛto rāhuḥ somaṃ gacchati parvasu // BndP_1,23.89 //
GP12brndp1_u:4382: atha keturathasyāśvā aṣṭau vai vātaraṃhasaḥ // BndP_1,23.90 //
GP12brndp1_u:4384: ete vāhā grahāṇāṃ ca hyupākhyātā rathaiḥ saha // BndP_1,23.91 //
GP12brndp1_u:4386: tapante brāmyamāṇāstu yathāyogaṃ bhramanti vai // BndP_1,23.92 //
GP12brndp1_u:4390: yathā nahyudake naustu salilena saho hyate // BndP_1,23.94 //
GP12brndp1_u:4392: sarppamāṇā na dṛśyante vyomni devagaṇāstu te // BndP_1,23.95 //
GP12brndp1_u:4394: sarvā dhruve nibaddhāśca bhramantyo bhrāmayanti tāḥ // BndP_1,23.96 //
GP12brndp1_u:4395: tailapīḍā yathā cakraṃ bhramanto bhrāmayanti ha /
GP12brndp1_u:4396: tathā bhramanti jyotīṃṣi vātabaddhāni sarvaśaḥ // BndP_1,23.97 //
GP12brndp1_u:4398: yato jyotīṃṣi vahate pravahastena sa smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,23.98 //
GP12brndp1_u:4400: saiṣa tārāmayo jñeyaḥ śiśumāro dhruvo divi // BndP_1,23.99 //
GP12brndp1_u:4406: yajñaḥ parastu vijñeyo dharmo marddhānamāśritaḥ // BndP_1,23.102 //
GP12brndp1_u:4408: varuṇaścāryamā caiva paścime tasya sakthinī // BndP_1,23.103 //
GP12brndp1_u:4410: pucche 'gniśca mahendraśca mārīcaḥ kaśyapo dhruvaḥ // BndP_1,23.104 //
GP12brndp1_u:4413: unmukhā vimukhāḥ sarve vakrībhūtāḥ śritā divi /
GP12brndp1_u:4416: agnīndrakaśyapānāṃ tu caramo 'sau dhruvaḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,23.107 //
GP12brndp1_u:4420: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahādṛvāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde dhruvacaryākīrttanaṃ nāma trayoviṃśatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:4425: kathaṃ devagṛhāṇi syuḥ kathaṃ jyotīṃṣivarṇaya // BndP_1,24.2 //
GP12brndp1_u:4428: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ tadā sūtaḥ samāhitaḥ // BndP_1,24.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:4434: divyasya bhautikasyāgnerabyoneḥ pārthi vasya tu // BndP_1,24.6 //
GP12brndp1_u:4443: yaścāsau tapate sūrye śuciragnistu sa smṛtaḥ /

GP12brndp1_u:4450: kiñcidapsu mataṃ tejaḥ kiñciddṛṣṭamabiṃ dhanam // BndP_1,24.14 //
GP12brndp1_u:4454: prabhā saurī tu pādena hyastaṃ yāti devākare // BndP_1,24.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:4458: prākāśyaṃ ca tathauṣṇyaṃ ca saurāgneye tu tejasī // BndP_1,24.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:4460: uttare caiva bhūmyarddhe tathā hyagniśca dakṣiṇe // BndP_1,24.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:4463: astaṃ yāti puna sūrye aharvai praviśatyapaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4464: tasmānnaktaṃ punaḥ śuklā āpo 'dṛśyanta bhāsvarāḥ // BndP_1,24.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:4470: ādatte sa tu nāḍīnāṃ sahasreṇa samantataḥ // BndP_1,24.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:4472: sthāvarā jaṅgamāścaiva yāśca kulyādikā apaḥ // BndP_1,24.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:4474: tāsāṃ catuḥśatā nāḍyo varṣante citra mūrttayaḥ // BndP_1,24.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:4476: amṛtā nāmataḥ sarvā raśmayo vṛṣṭisarjanāḥ // BndP_1,24.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:4478: dṛśyā meghāśca yāmyaśca hradinyo himasarjanāḥ // BndP_1,24.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:4485: vasaṃte caiva grīṣme ca śataiḥ sa tapati tribhiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4486: varṣāsvatho śaradi vai caturbhiśca pravarṣati // BndP_1,24.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:4487: hemante śiśire caiva hima mutsṛjate tribhiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4488: indro dhātā bhagaḥ pūṣā mitro 'tha varuṇor'yamā // BndP_1,24.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:4490: māghamāse tu varuṇaḥ pūṣā caiva tu phalālgune // BndP_1,24.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:4493: vivasvāñchrāvaṇe māsi proṣṭhe māse bhāgaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4494: parjanyo 'śvayuje māsi tvaṣṭā ca kārtike raviḥ // BndP_1,24.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:4504: śvetavarṇastu varṣāsu pāṇḍuḥ śaradi bhāskaraḥ // BndP_1,24.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:4506: iti varṇāḥ samā khyātāḥ sūryasyartusamudbhavāḥ // BndP_1,24.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:4507: auṣadhīṣu balaṃ dhatte svadhayā ca pidṛṣvapi /
GP12brndp1_u:4508: sūryo 'mareṣvapyamṛtaṃ trayaṃ triṣu na yacchati // BndP_1,24.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:4514: nakṣatrādhipatiḥ somo graha rājo divākaraḥ // BndP_1,24.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:4515: śeṣāḥ pañca grahā jñeyā īśvarāḥ kāmacāriṇaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4516: paṭhyate cāgnirāditya udakaṃ candramāḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,24.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:4520: rudro vaivasvataḥ sākṣādyamo lokaprabhuḥ svayam // BndP_1,24.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:4522: devāsuragurū dvau tu bhānumantau mahā grahau // BndP_1,24.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:4530: tataḥ saṃjāyate sarvaṃ tatra caiva pralīyate // BndP_1,24.54 //
GP12brndp1_u:4532: jagajjñeyo graho viprā dīptimānsuprabho raviḥ // BndP_1,24.55 //
GP12brndp1_u:4533: atra gacchanti nidhanaṃ jāyante ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4534: kṣaṇā muhūrttā divasā niśāḥ pakṣāśca kṛtsnaśaḥ // BndP_1,24.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:4536: tadādityādṛte hyeṣā kālaṃsakhyā na vidyate // BndP_1,24.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:4537: kālādṛte na nigamo na dīkṣā nāhnikakramaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4540: abhāvo vyavahārāṇāṃ jantūnāṃ divi caiha ca // BndP_1,24.59 //
GP12brndp1_u:4542: sa eṣa kālaścāgniśca dvādaśātmā prajāpatiḥ // BndP_1,24.60 //
GP12brndp1_u:4544: sa eṣa tecasāṃ rāśistamo ghransārvalaukikam // BndP_1,24.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:4552: teṣāṃ śreṣṭhāḥ punaḥ sapta raśmayo grahayo nayaḥ // BndP_1,24.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:4558: hari keśaḥ purastādya ṛkṣayoniḥ sa kītyate // BndP_1,24.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:4560: viśvaśravāstu yaḥ paścacchukrayoniḥ smṛto budhaiḥ // BndP_1,24.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:4561: saṃpadvasustu yo raśmiḥ sa yonirlohitasya tu /
GP12brndp1_u:4565: vartnte divi tāḥ sarvā viśvaṃ caidaṃ punarjagat /
GP12brndp1_u:4571: divyānāṃ pārthivānāṃ ca naiśānāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4574: svanāttejaso 'pāṃ ca tenāsau savitā mataḥ // BndP_1,24.76 //
GP12brndp1_u:4576: śuklatve cāmṛtatve ca śītatve ca vibhāvyate // BndP_1,24.77 //
GP12brndp1_u:4580: ghanatejomayaṃ śuklaṃ maṇḍalaṃ bhāskarasya tu // BndP_1,24.79 //
GP12brndp1_u:4584: sauraṃ sūryo viśetsthānaṃ saumyaṃ somastathaiva ca // BndP_1,24.81 //
GP12brndp1_u:4585: śaukraṃ śukro viśetsthānaṃ ṣoḍa śārciḥ prabhāsvaram /
GP12brndp1_u:4586: jaivaṃ bṛhaspatiścaiva lauhitaṃ caiva lohitaḥ // BndP_1,24.82 //
GP12brndp1_u:4590: gṛhāṇyetāni sarvāṇi jyotīṃṣi sukṛtātma nām // BndP_1,24.84 //
GP12brndp1_u:4595: atītaistu sahātītā bhāvyā bhāvyaiḥ suraiḥ saha /
GP12brndp1_u:4597: asminmanvantare caiva grahā vaitānikāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,24.87 //
GP12brndp1_u:4599: tviṣināmā dharmasutaḥ somo devo vasuḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,24.88 //
GP12brndp1_u:4601: bṛhattejāḥ smṛto devo devācāryo 'gi rassutaḥ // BndP_1,24.89 //
GP12brndp1_u:4611: āpyaṃ śyāmaṃ manojñasya pañcaraśmergṛhaṃ smṛtam // BndP_1,24.94 //
GP12brndp1_u:4615: aṣṛ raśmigṛhaṃ proktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ mandasya cāmmayam // BndP_1,24.96 //
GP12brndp1_u:4627: ādityāttacca niṣkramya somaṃ gacchati parvasu // BndP_1,24.102 //

GP12brndp1_u:7461: yathā vispandamānaṃ me kṣīraṃ sarvatra bhāvayet // BndP_1,36.194 //
GP12brndp1_u:7464: dhanuṣkoṭyā tathā vainyastena śailā vivarddhitāḥ // BndP_1,36.195 //
GP12brndp1_u:7466: svabhāvenā bhavattasyāḥ samāni viṣamāṇi ca // BndP_1,36.196 //
GP12brndp1_u:7467: na hi pūrvanisarge vai viṣame pṛthivītale /
GP12brndp1_u:7468: pravibhāgaḥ purāṇāṃ vā grāmāṇāṃ vāpi vidyate // BndP_1,36.197 //
GP12brndp1_u:7469: na sasyāni na gorakṣaṃ na kṛṣirna vaṇikpathaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7472: samatvaṃ yatra yatrāsīdbhūmeḥ kasmiṃścideva hi // BndP_1,36.199 //
GP12brndp1_u:7473: tatra tatra prajāstā vai nivasaṃti ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7474: āhāraḥ phala mūle tu prajānāmabhavatkila // BndP_1,36.200 //
GP12brndp1_u:7477: sa kalpayitvā vatsaṃ tu cākṣuṣaṃ manumīśvaraḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7478: pṛthurdudoha sasyāni sve tale pṛthivīṃ tataḥ // BndP_1,36.202 //
GP12brndp1_u:7479: tenānnena tatastā vai varttayanti śubhāḥ prajāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7480: ṛṣibhiḥ śrūyate cāpi punardugdhā vasuṃdharā // BndP_1,36.203 //
GP12brndp1_u:7483: kṣīramāsīttadā teṣāṃ tapo brahma ca śāśvatam /
GP12brndp1_u:7486: vatsastu maghavānāsīddogdhā ca savitā vibhuḥ // BndP_1,36.206 //
GP12brndp1_u:7487: kṣīramūrjaṃ ca madhu ca varttante tena devatāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7488: pitṛbhiḥ śrūyate cāpi punardugdhā vasundharā // BndP_1,36.207 //
GP12brndp1_u:7492: asuraiḥ śrūyate cāpi punardugdhā vasundharā // BndP_1,36.209 //
GP12brndp1_u:7496: pāyasā te ca māyābhiḥ sarve māyāvino 'surāḥ // BndP_1,36.211 //
GP12brndp1_u:7498: nāgaistu śrūyate dugdhā vatsaṃ kṛtvā tu takṣakam // BndP_1,36.212 //
GP12brndp1_u:7500: teṣāṃ vai vāsukirdegdhā kādraveyaḥ pratāpavān // BndP_1,36.213 //
GP12brndp1_u:7501: nāgānāṃ vai dvijaśreṣṭha sarpāṇāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7506: dogdhā rajatanābhastu pitā maṇidharasya yaḥ // BndP_1,36.216 //
GP12brndp1_u:7508: tena te varttayantīti paramarthatayā ca ha // BndP_1,36.217 //
GP12brndp1_u:7510: brahmā brāhyāstu vai dogadhā teṣāmāsītkuberakaḥ // BndP_1,36.218 //
GP12brndp1_u:7512: kapālapātre nirdugdhā hyantarddhanaṃ ca rākṣasaiḥ // BndP_1,36.219 //
GP12brndp1_u:7516: teṣāṃ vasurucistvāsīddogdhā putro muneḥ śubhaḥ // BndP_1,36.221 //
GP12brndp1_u:7518: śailaiśca śrūyate dugdhā punardevī vasundharā // BndP_1,36.222 //
GP12brndp1_u:7524: kāmadhuk puṣpitaḥ śālaḥ plakṣo vatso yaśasvinām // BndP_1,36.225 //
GP12brndp1_u:7526: saiva dhātrī vidhātrī ca dhāraṇī ca vasundharā // BndP_1,36.226 //
GP12brndp1_u:7527: dugdhā hitārthaṃ lokānāṃ pṛthuneti hi naḥ śrutam /
GP12brndp1_u:7528: carācarasya lokasya pratiṣṭhā yonireva ca // BndP_1,36.227 //
GP12brndp1_u:7529: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅga pāde śeṣamanvantarāśyānaṃ pṛthivīdohanaṃ ca nāma ṣaṭtriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:7532: vasu dhatte yatastasmādvasudhā seti gīyate // BndP_1,37.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:7546: yodhairapi ca saṃgrāme prāptukāmairjayaṃ yudhi // BndP_1,37.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:7548: yo hi yoddhā raṇaṃ yāti kīrttayitvā pṛthuṃ nṛpam // BndP_1,37.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:7552: ete vatsaviśeṣāśca dogdhāraḥ kṣīrameva ca // BndP_1,37.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:7554: brahmaṇā prathamaṃ dugdhā purā pṛthvī mahātmanā // BndP_1,37.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:7555: vāyuṃ kṛtvā tathā vatsaṃ bījāni vasudhātale /
GP12brndp1_u:7556: tataḥ svāyaṃbhuve pūrvaṃ tadā manvantare punaḥ // BndP_1,37.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:7557: vatsaṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ kṛtvā sarvasasyāni caiva hi /
GP12brndp1_u:7558: tataḥ svārociṣe vāpi prāpte manvantare 'dhunā // BndP_1,37.14 //
GP12brndp1_u:7559: vatsaṃ svārociṣaṃ kṛtvā dugdhā sasyāni medinī /
GP12brndp1_u:7560: uttamena tu tenāpi dugdhā devānu jena tu // BndP_1,37.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:7562: punaśca pañcame pṛthvī tāmasasyāntare manoḥ // BndP_1,37.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:7563: dugdheyaṃ tāmasaṃ vatsaṃ kṛtvā vai balabandhunā /
GP12brndp1_u:7564: cāriṣṭavasya vai ṣaṣṭhe saṃprāpte cāntare manoḥ // BndP_1,37.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:7565: dugdhā mahī purāṇena vatsaṃ cāriṣṭavaṃ prati /
GP12brndp1_u:7566: cākṣuṣe cāpi saṃprāpte tadā manvantare punaḥ // BndP_1,37.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:7567: dugdhā mahī purāṇena vatsaṃ kṛtvā tu cākṣuṣam /
GP12brndp1_u:7569: vainyeneyaṃ purā dugdhā yathā te kathitaṃ mayā /
GP12brndp1_u:7570: etairdugdhā purā pṛthvī vyatīteṣvantareṣu vai // BndP_1,37.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:7573: devā manvantare svasthāḥ pṛthostu śṛṇuta prajāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7581: samudratanayāyāṃ tu kṛtadāraḥ sa vai prabhuḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7592: tadupaśrutya tapasā sarve yuktāḥ pracetasaḥ // BndP_1,37.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:7602: bhaviṣyajjanatā hyeṣā dhṛtā garbheṇa vai mayā // BndP_1,37.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:7604: bhāryā bhavatu vo hyeṣā somagarbhā vivarddhitā // BndP_1,37.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:7610: saṃtdṛtya kopaṃ vṛkṣebhyaḥ patnīṃ dharmeṇa māriṣām // BndP_1,37.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:7614: asṛjanmanasā tvādau prajā dakṣo 'tha maithunāt // BndP_1,37.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:7616: visṛjya manasā dakṣaḥ paścādasṛjata striyaḥ // BndP_1,37.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:7617: dadau sa daśa dharmāya kaśyapāya trayāṃ daśa /
GP12brndp1_u:7620: dve caiva bahuputrāya dve caivāṅgirase tathā // BndP_1,37.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:7622: antaraṃ cākṣuṣasyātha manoḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu gīyate // BndP_1,37.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:7624: vasudevāḥ khagā gāvo nāgā ditijadānavāḥ // BndP_1,37.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:7629: devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca devarṣiṇāṃ ca te śubhaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7630: saṃbhavaḥ kathitaḥ pūrvaṃ dakṣasya ca mahātmanaḥ // BndP_1,37.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:7632: kathaṃ prāce tastvaṃ ca punarlebhe mahātapāḥ // BndP_1,37.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:7633: etaṃ naḥ saṃśayaṃ sūta vyākhyātuṃ tvamihārhasi /
GP12brndp1_u:7634: dauhitraścaiva somasya kathaṃ śrvaśuratāṃ gataḥ // BndP_1,37.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:7637: ṛṣayo 'tra na suhyanti vidyāvantaśca ye janāḥ // BndP_1,37.52 //
GP12brndp1_u:7638: yuge yuge bhavantyete sarve dakṣādayo dvijāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7639: punaścaiva nirudhyante vidvāṃstatra na muhyati // BndP_1,37.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:7642: imāṃ visṛṣṭiṃ yo veda cākṣuṣasya carācaram /
GP12brndp1_u:7645: ityete ṣaṭ nisargāśca krāntā manvantarātmakāḥ // BndP_1,37.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:7647: ete sargā yathā prājñaiḥ proktā ye dvijasattamāḥ // BndP_1,37.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:7653: samāsavyāsataḥ sargaṃ bruvato me nibodhata // BndP_1,37.60 //
GP12brndp1_u:7654: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde cākṣuṣasargavarṇanaṃ nāma saptatriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:7658: ādityā vasavī rudrāḥ sādhyā viśve marudgaṇāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7661: sādhyāśya vasavo viśve dharmaputrāstrayo gaṇāḥ // BndP_1,38.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:7663: vaivasvateṃ'tare hyasminnitye te chandajā matāḥ // BndP_1,38.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:7665: evaṃ sargastu mārīco vijñeyaḥ sāṃprataḥ śubhaḥ // BndP_1,38.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:7667: atītānāgatā ye ca varttante sāṃprataṃ ca ye // BndP_1,38.6 //
GP12brndp1_u:7672: trailokye yāni sattvāni gatimanti dhruvāṇi ca /
GP12brndp1_u:7679: bhavyaṃ smṛtaṃ divaṃ hyetatteṣāṃ vakṣyāmi sādhanam // BndP_1,38.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:7687: bhavanāttu bhuvalloko niruttayā hi nirucyate // BndP_1,38.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:7689: utpanne tu tathā loke dvitīye brahmaṇā punaḥ // BndP_1,38.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:7691: anāgate bhavya ita śabda eṣa vibhāvyate // BndP_1,38.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:7693: bhūritīyaṃ smṛtā bhūmirantarikṣaṃ bhuvaḥ smṛtam // BndP_1,38.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:7694: divaṃ smṛtaṃ tathā bhavyaṃ tralokyasyaiṣa nirṇayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7696: nātha ityeṣa dhāturvai dhātujñaiḥ pālane smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7700: manvantareṣu ye devā yajñabhājo bhavanti hi /
GP12brndp1_u:7702: mahimānaḥ smṛtā hyete devendrāṇāṃ tu sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7703: devendrā guravo nāthā rājānaḥ pitaro hi te // BndP_1,38.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:7715: ikṣvākuśca nṛgaścaiva dhṛṣṭaḥ śaryātireba ca // BndP_1,38.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:7719: kīrtitā vai tathā hyete saptamaṃ caitadantaram // BndP_1,38.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:7720: ityeṣa ha mayā pādo dvitīyaḥ kathitodvijāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7721: vistareṇānupūrvyā ca bhūyaḥ kiṃ kathayāmyaham // BndP_1,38.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:7722: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde manvantaravarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭātriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
